animgraph_debug_filterent.description: Filter setting for animgraph_debug_variables output. If set to -1, show debug for all entities. If set to 0, show debug for any NPCs that have been npc_selected. If set to >0, something other than 0, show debug for the entity with the matching entindex.

animgraph_debug_variables.description: Turn on to see animgraph variable changes for entities passing animgraph_debug_filterent.

animgraph_debug_variables_ignore_missing.description: If set, animgraph_debug_variables won't show debug for warnings about sets to missing variables.

animgraph_debug_variables_ignore_nonchan.description: If set, animgraph_debug_variables won't show debug for variable sets that don't change the value.

animgraph_footlock_auto_ledge_detection.title: animgraph_footlock_auto_ledge_detection
animgraph_footlock_auto_ledge_detection.description: Attempt to detect when the foot is partially hanging off a ledge and stop it tilting to reach the bottom

animgraph_footlock_auto_stair_detection.title: animgraph_footlock_auto_stair_detection
animgraph_footlock_auto_stair_detection.description: Attempt to detect when the foot is on a stair and will stop it from tilting to reach the next step

animgraph_footlock_enabled.title: animgraph_footlock_enabled
animgraph_footlock_enabled.description: A master convar that effectively disables the entire footlock node.

animgraph_footlock_trace_ground_enabled.title: animgraph_footlock_trace_ground_enabled
animgraph_footlock_trace_ground_enabled.description: Convar for toggling foot lock ground tracking.

animgraph_network_enable.title: animgraph_network_enable
animgraph_network_enable.description: Enable animation graph networking. The setting is only read at graph creation time; to use please set on the command line.

animgraph_record_all.title: animgraph_record_all
animgraph_record_all.description: Automatically start recording AnimGraphs when they get created, and save them to disk when they are destroyed

async_serialize.title: async_serialize
async_serialize.description: Force async reads to serialize for profiling

audio_input_test_signal.title: audio_input_test_signal
audio_input_test_signal.description: For testing the audio input pathway with a sine tone instead of SDL3.

autosave_fully_async.title: autosave_fully_async
autosave_fully_async.description: Set to 1 to have autosaves execute completely on the save thread, forces 'render only' mode while the save completes

battery_saver.title: battery_saver
battery_saver.description: OBSOLETE replaced by mobile_fps_* - Battery saver mode. 0=off, 1=on

blink_duration.title: blink_duration
blink_duration.description: How many seconds an eye blink will last.

bot_allow_grenades.title: bot_allow_grenades
bot_allow_grenades.description: If nonzero, bots may use grenades.

bot_allow_machine_guns.title: bot_allow_machine_guns
bot_allow_machine_guns.description: If nonzero, bots may use the machine gun.

bot_allow_pistols.title: bot_allow_pistols
bot_allow_pistols.description: If nonzero, bots may use pistols.

bot_allow_rifles.title: bot_allow_rifles
bot_allow_rifles.description: If nonzero, bots may use rifles.

bot_allow_rogues.title: bot_allow_rogues
bot_allow_rogues.description: If nonzero, bots may occasionally go 'rogue'. Rogue bots do not obey radio commands, nor pursue scenario goals.

bot_allow_shotguns.title: bot_allow_shotguns
bot_allow_shotguns.description: If nonzero, bots may use shotguns.

bot_allow_snipers.title: bot_allow_snipers
bot_allow_snipers.description: If nonzero, bots may use sniper rifles.

bot_allow_sub_machine_guns.title: bot_allow_sub_machine_guns
bot_allow_sub_machine_guns.description: If nonzero, bots may use sub-machine guns.

bot_auto_follow.title: bot_auto_follow
bot_auto_follow.description: If nonzero, bots with high co-op may automatically follow a nearby human player.

bot_auto_vacate.title: bot_auto_vacate
bot_auto_vacate.description: If nonzero, bots will automatically leave to make room for human players.

bot_autodifficulty_threshold_high.title: bot_autodifficulty_threshold_high
bot_autodifficulty_threshold_high.description: Upper bound above Average Human Contribution Score that a bot must be above to change its difficulty

bot_autodifficulty_threshold_low.title: bot_autodifficulty_threshold_low
bot_autodifficulty_threshold_low.description: Lower bound below Average Human Contribution Score that a bot must be below to change its difficulty

bot_chatter.title: bot_chatter
bot_chatter.description: Control how bots talk. Allowed values: 'off', 'radio', 'minimal', or 'normal'.

bot_chatter_use_rr.title: bot_chatter_use_rr
bot_chatter_use_rr.description: 0 = Use old bot chatter system, 1 = Use response rules

bot_controllable.title: bot_controllable
bot_controllable.description: Determines whether bots can be controlled by players

bot_coop_idle_max_vision_distance.title: bot_coop_idle_max_vision_distance
bot_coop_idle_max_vision_distance.description: Max distance bots can see targets (in coop) when they are idle, dormant, hiding or asleep.

bot_defer_to_human_goals.title: bot_defer_to_human_goals
bot_defer_to_human_goals.description: If nonzero and there is a human on the team, the bots will not do the scenario tasks.

bot_defer_to_human_items.title: bot_defer_to_human_items
bot_defer_to_human_items.description: If nonzero and there is a human on the team, the bots will not get scenario items.

bot_difficulty.title: bot_difficulty
bot_difficulty.description: Defines the skill of bots joining the game.  Values are: 0=easy, 1=normal, 2=hard, 3=expert.

bot_dont_shoot.title: bot_dont_shoot
bot_dont_shoot.description: If nonzero, bots will not fire weapons (for debugging).

bot_eco_limit.title: bot_eco_limit
bot_eco_limit.description: If nonzero, bots will not buy if their money falls below this amount.

bot_flipout.title: bot_flipout
bot_flipout.description: If nonzero, bots use no CPU for AI. Instead, they run around randomly.

bot_ignore_enemies.title: bot_ignore_enemies
bot_ignore_enemies.description: If nonzero, bots will ignore enemies (for debugging).

bot_ignore_players.title: bot_ignore_players
bot_ignore_players.description: Bots will not see non-bot players.

bot_join_after_player.title: bot_join_after_player
bot_join_after_player.description: If nonzero, bots wait until a player joins before entering the game.

bot_join_delay.title: bot_join_delay
bot_join_delay.description: Prevents bots from joining the server for this many seconds after a map change.

bot_join_in_warmup.title: bot_join_in_warmup
bot_join_in_warmup.description: Prevents bots from joining the server while warmup phase is active.

bot_join_team.title: bot_join_team
bot_join_team.description: Determines the team bots will join into. Allowed values: 'any', 'T', or 'CT'.

bot_loadout.title: bot_loadout
bot_loadout.description: bots are given these items at round start

bot_max_visible_smoke_length.title: bot_max_visible_smoke_length
bot_max_visible_smoke_length.description: Bots will see players through smoke clouds up to this length.

bot_max_vision_distance_override.title: bot_max_vision_distance_override
bot_max_vision_distance_override.description: Max distance bots can see targets.

bot_mimic.title: bot_mimic
bot_mimic.description: Bot uses usercmd of player by index.

bot_mimic_spec_buttons.title: bot_mimic_spec_buttons
bot_mimic_spec_buttons.description: +attack, +jump etc are used for spectator control instead of being passed on to spectated bot

bot_prefix.title: bot_prefix
bot_prefix.description: This string is prefixed to the name of all bots that join the game.

bot_quota.title: bot_quota
bot_quota.description: Determines the total number of bots in the game.

bot_randombuy.title: bot_randombuy
bot_randombuy.description: should bots ignore their prefered weapons and just buy weapons at random?

bot_show_battlefront.title: bot_show_battlefront
bot_show_battlefront.description: Show areas where rushing players will initially meet.

bot_show_occupy_time.title: bot_show_occupy_time
bot_show_occupy_time.description: Show when each nav area can first be reached by each team.

bot_walk.title: bot_walk
bot_walk.description: If nonzero, bots can only walk, not run.

bot_zombie.title: bot_zombie
bot_zombie.description: If nonzero, bots will stay in idle mode and not attack.

buddha.title: buddha
buddha.description: Player takes damage but won't die

buddha_reset_hp.title: buddha_reset_hp
buddha_reset_hp.description: HP to set when damaged below zero in Buddha Mode

buildcubemaps_renderdoc_capture.title: buildcubemaps_renderdoc_capture
buildcubemaps_renderdoc_capture.description: Capture a specific cubemap with RenderDoc during buildcubemaps.

cam_collision.title: cam_collision
cam_collision.description: When in thirdperson and cam_collision is set to 1, an attempt is made to keep the camera from passing though walls.

cam_head_constraint_debug.title: cam_head_constraint_debug
cam_head_constraint_debug.description: Show camera head constraint debug info

cam_head_constraint_distance.title: cam_head_constraint_distance
cam_head_constraint_distance.description: Distance to constrain first/thirdperson camera and head

cam_ideallag.title: cam_ideallag
cam_ideallag.description: Amount of lag used when matching offset to ideal angles in thirdperson view

cam_showangles.title: cam_showangles
cam_showangles.description: When in thirdperson, print viewangles/idealangles/cameraoffsets to the console.

cc_captiontrace.title: cc_captiontrace
cc_captiontrace.description: Show missing closecaptions (0 = no, 1 = devconsole, 2 = show in hud)

cc_delay_time.title: cc_delay_time
cc_delay_time.description: Close caption delay before showing caption.

cc_log.title: cc_log
cc_log.description: Log caption names and contents (0 = off, 1 = found captions, 2 = unfound captions, 3 = all captions)

cc_norepeat.title: cc_norepeat
cc_norepeat.description: In multiplayer games, don't repeat captions more often than this many seconds.

cc_subtitles.title: cc_subtitles
cc_subtitles.description: If set, don't show sound effect captions, just voice overs (i.e., won't help hearing impaired players).

cc_vr_caption_catchup_interval.title: cc_vr_caption_catchup_interval
cc_vr_caption_catchup_interval.description: Duration it takes for attached caption to ideal point

cc_vr_debug.title: cc_vr_debug
cc_vr_debug.description: Debug visualization of VR closed caption placement

cc_vr_depth_test.title: cc_vr_depth_test
cc_vr_depth_test.description: Have closed caption Panorama panel perform depth testing against the scene

cc_vr_epsilon.title: cc_vr_epsilon
cc_vr_epsilon.description: Epsilon to trigger movement of VR subtitle panel in world space

cc_vr_forward_offset.title: cc_vr_forward_offset
cc_vr_forward_offset.description: Subtitle offset distance (forward, in front of player)

cc_vr_vertical_offset.title: cc_vr_vertical_offset
cc_vr_vertical_offset.description: Subtitle vertical offset distance (positive is up)

cldrawtargetidtrace.title: clDrawTargetIDTrace
cldrawtargetidtrace.description: visualizing line trace for target ID

cl_showbonesetupents.title: cl_ShowBoneSetupEnts
cl_showbonesetupents.description: Show which entities are having their bones setup each frame.

cl_allow_animated_avatars.title: cl_allow_animated_avatars
cl_allow_animated_avatars.description: Whether or not to allow animated avatars

cl_async_client_shatter.title: cl_async_client_shatter
cl_async_client_shatter.description: spawn client glass shards asynchronously during demos or when remotely connected.

cl_autobuy.title: cl_autobuy
cl_autobuy.description: The order in which autobuy will attempt to purchase items

cl_boxmove.title: cl_boxmove
cl_boxmove.description: run in a square, # represents how many usercommands to run before turning.

cl_boxmove_speed.title: cl_boxmove_speed
cl_boxmove_speed.description: how fast to run (1 to use player max run speed).

cl_buywheel_donate_key.title: cl_buywheel_donate_key
cl_buywheel_donate_key.description: Set the key to use for donation in the buy menu. 0: Left Control; 1: Left Alt; 2: Left Shift.

cl_buywheel_nonumberpurchasing.title: cl_buywheel_nonumberpurchasing
cl_buywheel_nonumberpurchasing.description: Set non-zero to prevent buy wheel from purchasing via number keys

cl_clanid.title: cl_clanid
cl_clanid.description: Current clan ID for name decoration

cl_clock_buffer_ticks.title: cl_clock_buffer_ticks
cl_clock_buffer_ticks.description: Clock sync will try to maintain an additional margin of N ticks.  This is intended to smooth over packet loss, and is a replacement for cl_interp_ratio / cl_interp.  This value is simply added to cl_clock_recvmargin_desired

cl_clock_correction.title: cl_clock_correction
cl_clock_correction.description: Enable/disable clock correction on the client.

cl_clock_recvmargin_adjust_limit_slowdow.title: cl_clock_recvmargin_adjust_limit_slowdown
cl_clock_recvmargin_adjust_limit_slowdow.description: Clock sync will not slow down time slower than N%

cl_clock_recvmargin_adjust_limit_speedup.title: cl_clock_recvmargin_adjust_limit_speedup
cl_clock_recvmargin_adjust_limit_speedup.description: Clock sync will not speed up time faster than N%

cl_clock_recvmargin_desired.title: cl_clock_recvmargin_desired
cl_clock_recvmargin_desired.description: Clock sync will try to maintain N ms margin between tick arrival and polling network.  The effective value is the sum of this and the time implied by cl_clock_buffer_ticks

cl_clock_recvmargin_minsamples_slowdown.title: cl_clock_recvmargin_minsamples_slowdown
cl_clock_recvmargin_minsamples_slowdown.description: Clock sync will not slow down unless we have N indicating samples

cl_clock_recvmargin_minsamples_speedup.title: cl_clock_recvmargin_minsamples_speedup
cl_clock_recvmargin_minsamples_speedup.description: Clock sync will not speed up unless we have N seconds of indicating samples

cl_clock_recvmargin_timeconstant_slowdow.title: cl_clock_recvmargin_timeconstant_slowdown
cl_clock_recvmargin_timeconstant_slowdow.description: Clock sync will remove 63.2% of the error in N seconds

cl_clock_recvmargin_timeconstant_speedup.title: cl_clock_recvmargin_timeconstant_speedup
cl_clock_recvmargin_timeconstant_speedup.description: Clock sync will remove 63.2% of the error in N seconds

cl_clock_recvmargin_window.title: cl_clock_recvmargin_window
cl_clock_recvmargin_window.description: Clock sync will use past N seconds

cl_clockdrift_max_ticks.title: cl_clockdrift_max_ticks
cl_clockdrift_max_ticks.description: Maximum number of ticks the clock is allowed to drift before the client snaps its clock to the server's.

cl_clutch_mode.title: cl_clutch_mode
cl_clutch_mode.description: Silence voice and other distracting sounds until the end of round or next death.

cl_connectionretrytime_p2p.title: cl_connectionretrytime_p2p
cl_connectionretrytime_p2p.description: Number of seconds over which to spread retry attempts for P2P.

cl_cq_min_queue.title: cl_cq_min_queue
cl_cq_min_queue.description: Used by the client to inform the server of their desired queue length.  Derived from cl_tickpacket_recvmargin_desired and cl_tickpacket_desired_queuelength

cl_crosshair_drawoutline.title: cl_crosshair_drawoutline
cl_crosshair_drawoutline.description: Draws a black outline around the crosshair for better visibility

cl_crosshair_dynamic_maxdist_splitratio.title: cl_crosshair_dynamic_maxdist_splitratio

[inner = cl_crosshairsize*(1-cl_crosshair_dynamic_maxdist_splitratio), outer = cl_crosshairsize*cl_crosshair_dynamic_maxdist_splitratio]  [0 - 1]

cl_crosshair_dynamic_splitalpha_innermod.title: cl_crosshair_dynamic_splitalpha_innermod
cl_crosshair_dynamic_splitalpha_innermod.description: If using cl_crosshairstyle 2, this is the alpha modification that will be used for the INNER crosshair pips once they've split. [0 - 1]

cl_crosshair_dynamic_splitalpha_outermod.title: cl_crosshair_dynamic_splitalpha_outermod
cl_crosshair_dynamic_splitalpha_outermod.description: If using cl_crosshairstyle 2, this is the alpha modification that will be used for the OUTER crosshair pips once they've split. [0.3 - 1]

cl_crosshair_dynamic_splitdist.title: cl_crosshair_dynamic_splitdist
cl_crosshair_dynamic_splitdist.description: If using cl_crosshairstyle 2, this is the distance that the crosshair pips will split into 2. (default is 7)

cl_crosshair_outlinethickness.title: cl_crosshair_outlinethickness
cl_crosshair_outlinethickness.description: Set how thick you want your crosshair outline to draw (0-3)

cl_crosshair_sniper_width.title: cl_crosshair_sniper_width
cl_crosshair_sniper_width.description: If >1 sniper scope cross lines gain extra width (1 for single-pixel hairline)

cl_crosshaircolor.title: cl_crosshaircolor
cl_crosshaircolor.description: Set crosshair color as defined in game_options.consoles.txt

cl_crosshairgap_useweaponvalue.title: cl_crosshairgap_useweaponvalue
cl_crosshairgap_useweaponvalue.description: If set to 1, the gap will update dynamically based on which weapon is currently equipped

cl_crosshairstyle.title: cl_crosshairstyle
cl_crosshairstyle.description: 0 = DEFAULT (DISABLED), 1 = DEFAULT STATIC (DISABLED), 2 = DEFAULT (accurate recoil/spread feedback with a fixed inner part), 3 = ACCURATE DYNAMIC (DISABLED) (accurate recoil/spread feedback), 4 = DEFAULT STATIC, 5 = LEGACY (fake recoil - inaccurate feedback)

cl_deathcam_audio_mix_phase1_fade_amount.title: cl_deathcam_audio_mix_phase1_fade_amount
cl_deathcam_audio_mix_phase1_fade_amount.description: Sets the amount of ducking to do on death cam fade out. When set to 1, full DeathFadeLayer is applied.

cl_deathcam_audio_mix_phase1_fade_time.title: cl_deathcam_audio_mix_phase1_fade_time
cl_deathcam_audio_mix_phase1_fade_time.description: Sets the amount of time we fade out over.

cl_deathcam_audio_mix_phase2_fade_amount.title: cl_deathcam_audio_mix_phase2_fade_amount
cl_deathcam_audio_mix_phase2_fade_amount.description: Sets the amount of ducking to do on death cam fade out. When set to 1, full DeathFadeLayer is applied.

cl_deathcam_audio_mix_phase2_fade_time.title: cl_deathcam_audio_mix_phase2_fade_time
cl_deathcam_audio_mix_phase2_fade_time.description: Sets the amount of time we fade out over.

cl_deathcampanel_position_dynamic.title: cl_deathcampanel_position_dynamic
cl_deathcampanel_position_dynamic.description: Turn on/off deathcam's kill panel dynamic Y movement

cl_deathnotices_show_numbers.title: cl_deathnotices_show_numbers
cl_deathnotices_show_numbers.description: 0: default; 1: draw names as just numbers; 2: append number on killer and victim to the name

cl_debounce_zoom.title: cl_debounce_zoom
cl_debounce_zoom.description: Whether or not to disable holding secondary fire to cycle zoom levels

cl_debugviewangle.title: cl_debugviewangle
cl_debugviewangle.description: Plots view angles yaw at various stages of the frame/tick in Tracy.

cl_demo_steadycam_deflection.title: cl_demo_steadycam_deflection
cl_demo_steadycam_deflection.description: if camera orientation changes this much update orientation

cl_demo_steadycam_enable.title: cl_demo_steadycam_enable
cl_demo_steadycam_enable.description: Stabilize camera orientation/position during demo playback.  1 == remove roll, 2 == steadycam

cl_demo_steadycam_radius.title: cl_demo_steadycam_radius
cl_demo_steadycam_radius.description: if camera moves this much from last anchor update anchor

cl_demo_view_offset_left.title: cl_demo_view_offset_left
cl_demo_view_offset_left.description: View offset during demo playback (+/- 1.25 is a good default for human average left/right eye offset)

cl_disable_deathcam_audio_mix_fade_out.title: cl_disable_deathcam_audio_mix_fade_out
cl_disable_deathcam_audio_mix_fade_out.description: When set to true, disables audio being silenced while the death cam fades out.

cl_disconnect_soundevent.description: This soundevent is called to stop the desired soundevents when the game is disconnected.

cl_disconnect_voice_fade.title: cl_disconnect_voice_fade
cl_disconnect_voice_fade.description: This is a fade of current voices that is called when the game is disconnected. -1.f for no fade on disconnect

cl_dm_buyrandomweapons.title: cl_dm_buyrandomweapons

cl_dormant_spew.title: cl_dormant_spew

cl_draw_only_deathnotices.title: cl_draw_only_deathnotices
cl_draw_only_deathnotices.description: For drawing only the crosshair and death notices (used for moviemaking)

cl_drawhud.title: cl_drawhud

cl_drawhud_force_deathnotices.title: cl_drawhud_force_deathnotices
cl_drawhud_force_deathnotices.description: 0: default; 1: draw deathnotices even if hud disabled; -1: force no deathnotices

cl_drawhud_force_radar.title: cl_drawhud_force_radar
cl_drawhud_force_radar.description: 0: default; 1: draw radar even if hud disabled; -1: force no radar

cl_drawhud_force_teamid_overhead.title: cl_drawhud_force_teamid_overhead
cl_drawhud_force_teamid_overhead.description: 0: default; 1: draw teamid even if hud disabled; -1: force no teamid

cl_drawhud_specvote.title: cl_drawhud_specvote
cl_drawhud_specvote.description: 1: default; 0: disables vote UI for spectators

cl_embedded_stream_audio_volume_xmaster.title: cl_embedded_stream_audio_volume_xmaster
cl_embedded_stream_audio_volume_xmaster.description: Whether embedded stream audio volume gets multiplied by master volume

cl_ent_show_contexts.title: cl_ent_show_contexts
cl_ent_show_contexts.description: Show entity contexts in ent_text display

cl_error_report_time.title: cl_error_report_time
cl_error_report_time.description: Minimum time in seconds that must elapse before printing prediction error summary. 0 to disable.

cl_extrapolate.title: cl_extrapolate
cl_extrapolate.description: Enable/disable extrapolation if interpolation history runs out.

cl_extrapolate_amount.title: cl_extrapolate_amount
cl_extrapolate_amount.description: Set how many seconds the client will extrapolate entities for.

cl_fixedcrosshairgap.title: cl_fixedcrosshairgap
cl_fixedcrosshairgap.description: For crosshair style 1: How big to make the gap between the pips in the fixed crosshair

cl_flushentitypacket.title: cl_flushentitypacket
cl_flushentitypacket.description: For debugging. Force the engine to flush an entity packet.

cl_frametime_summary_report_detailed.title: cl_frametime_summary_report_detailed
cl_frametime_summary_report_detailed.description: When a perf report is dumped at the end of the session, should it be detailed?

cl_grenadecrosshair_keepusercrosshair.title: cl_grenadecrosshair_keepusercrosshair
cl_grenadecrosshair_keepusercrosshair.description: Keep the user's crosshair when the grenade crosshair is enabled

cl_grenadecrosshairdelay_decoy.title: cl_grenadecrosshairdelay_decoy
cl_grenadecrosshairdelay_decoy.description: How long should the pin be pulled for before showing the grenade crosshair

cl_grenadecrosshairdelay_explosive.title: cl_grenadecrosshairdelay_explosive
cl_grenadecrosshairdelay_explosive.description: How long should the pin be pulled for before showing the grenade crosshair

cl_grenadecrosshairdelay_fire.title: cl_grenadecrosshairdelay_fire
cl_grenadecrosshairdelay_fire.description: How long should the pin be pulled for before showing the grenade crosshair

cl_grenadecrosshairdelay_flash.title: cl_grenadecrosshairdelay_flash
cl_grenadecrosshairdelay_flash.description: How long should the pin be pulled for before showing the grenade crosshair

cl_grenadecrosshairdelay_smoke.title: cl_grenadecrosshairdelay_smoke
cl_grenadecrosshairdelay_smoke.description: How long should the pin be pulled for before showing the grenade crosshair

cl_hide_avatar_images.title: cl_hide_avatar_images
cl_hide_avatar_images.description: Hide avatar images for other players.

cl_hold_game_events_force_delay_ticks.title: cl_hold_game_events_force_delay_ticks
cl_hold_game_events_force_delay_ticks.description: Debugging convar to force late dispatch of game events.

cl_hold_game_events_until_server_tick.title: cl_hold_game_events_until_server_tick
cl_hold_game_events_until_server_tick.description: Holds game events until client has received the tick the event was fired on.

cl_http_log_enable.title: cl_http_log_enable
cl_http_log_enable.description: Allows sending HTTP log from client main menu.

cl_hud_color.title: cl_hud_color
cl_hud_color.description: 0 = team color, 1 =  white, 2 = bright white, 3 = light blue, 4 = blue, 5 = purple, 6 = red, 7 = orange, 8 = yellow, 9 = green, 10 = aqua, 11 = pink, 12 = teammate color.

cl_hud_radar_map_additive.title: cl_hud_radar_map_additive
cl_hud_radar_map_additive.description: Blend Hud radar map additively on top of background.

cl_hud_telemetry_frametime_poor.title: cl_hud_telemetry_frametime_poor
cl_hud_telemetry_frametime_poor.description: Frame time greater than this is considered 'poor'.

cl_hud_telemetry_frametime_show.title: cl_hud_telemetry_frametime_show
cl_hud_telemetry_frametime_show.description: Show frame time (FPS) in the HUD.  0=never, 1=only if poor, 2=always

cl_hud_telemetry_net_detailed.title: cl_hud_telemetry_net_detailed
cl_hud_telemetry_net_detailed.description: Show breakdown network misdelivery (loss, late delivery, and peak jitter).  0=never, 1=only in poor network conditions, 2=always

cl_hud_telemetry_net_misdelivery_poor.title: cl_hud_telemetry_net_misdelivery_poor
cl_hud_telemetry_net_misdelivery_poor.description: Packet delivery anomaly rate (0..100) higher than this is considered 'poor'.

cl_hud_telemetry_net_misdelivery_show.title: cl_hud_telemetry_net_misdelivery_show
cl_hud_telemetry_net_misdelivery_show.description: Show percentage of user commands & server snapshots that are missed due to network conditions.  0=never, 1=only in poor conditions, 2=always

cl_hud_telemetry_net_quality_graph_show.title: cl_hud_telemetry_net_quality_graph_show
cl_hud_telemetry_net_quality_graph_show.description: Show packet jitter and netframe loss/reordering in the HUD.  0=never, 1=only in poor conditions, 2=always

cl_hud_telemetry_ping_poor.title: cl_hud_telemetry_ping_poor
cl_hud_telemetry_ping_poor.description: Ping higher than this (ms) is considered 'poor'.

cl_hud_telemetry_ping_show.title: cl_hud_telemetry_ping_show
cl_hud_telemetry_ping_show.description: Show ping in the HUD.  0=never, 1=only in poor conditions, 2=always

cl_hud_telemetry_serverrecvmargin_graph_.title: cl_hud_telemetry_serverrecvmargin_graph_show
cl_hud_telemetry_serverrecvmargin_graph_.description: Show graph of the server recv margin in the HUD.  (How early/late user commands are arriving at the server before they are executed.)   0=never, 1=only when there are command queue problems, 2=always

cl_ignore_campaign_completion_requiremen.title: cl_ignore_campaign_completion_requirements
cl_ignore_campaign_completion_requiremen.description: Ignores campaign progression requirements when granting quests.

cl_ignorepackets.title: cl_ignorepackets
cl_ignorepackets.description: Force client to ignore packets (for debugging).

cl_interp_animationvars.title: cl_interp_animationvars
cl_interp_animationvars.description: Interpolate LATCH_ANIMATION_BIT vars if interpolation interval is greater than simulation interval

cl_interp_hermite.title: cl_interp_hermite
cl_interp_hermite.description: Set to zero do disable hermite interpolation.

cl_interp_npcs.title: cl_interp_npcs
cl_interp_npcs.description: Interpolate NPC positions starting this many seconds in past (or the value as per cl_interp_ratio, if greater)

cl_interp_ratio.title: cl_interp_ratio
cl_interp_ratio.description: Set number of client simulation interpolation ticks.

cl_interp_simulationvars.title: cl_interp_simulationvars
cl_interp_simulationvars.description: Interpolate LATCH_SIMULATION_BIT vars if interpolation interval is greater than animation interval

cl_interp_threadmodeticks.title: cl_interp_threadmodeticks
cl_interp_threadmodeticks.description: Additional interpolation ticks to use when interpolating with threaded engine mode set.

cl_interpolate_report.title: cl_interpolate_report
cl_interpolate_report.description: Enable to show interpolation profile timing

cl_inventory_radial_immediate_select.title: cl_inventory_radial_immediate_select
cl_inventory_radial_immediate_select.description: In inventory selection radials. Select weapons the moment the cursor highlights them. Otherwise, only select the selected item on exit.

cl_inventory_radial_tap_to_cycle.title: cl_inventory_radial_tap_to_cycle
cl_inventory_radial_tap_to_cycle.description: In inventory selection radials. Select weapons the moment the cursor highlights them. Otherwise, only select the selected item on exit.

cl_invites_only_friends.title: cl_invites_only_friends
cl_invites_only_friends.description: If turned on, will ignore in-game invites from recent teammates or other non-friends

cl_invites_only_mainmenu.title: cl_invites_only_mainmenu
cl_invites_only_mainmenu.description: If turned on, will ignore all invites when user is playing a match

cl_ironsight_usecrosshaircolor.title: cl_ironsight_usecrosshaircolor
cl_ironsight_usecrosshaircolor.description: Should the scope dot match the user's crosshair color

cl_itemimages_dynamically_generated.title: cl_itemimages_dynamically_generated
cl_itemimages_dynamically_generated.description: 2: use render-targets, fallback to cache and disk; 1: no render targets, but use cache and fallback to disk; 0: disk assets only

cl_jiggle_bone_sanity.title: cl_jiggle_bone_sanity
cl_jiggle_bone_sanity.description: Prevent jiggle bones from pointing directly away from their target in case of numerical instability.

cl_jitter_bad_threshold_up.title: cl_jitter_bad_threshold_up
cl_jitter_bad_threshold_up.description: When upstream packet jitter in a frame exceeds this threshold (ms), the frame is considered to have 'irregular delivery'.  This is a derived value and should not be modified manually

cl_join_advertise.title: cl_join_advertise
cl_join_advertise.description: Advertise joinable game in progress to Steam friends, otherwise need a Steam invite (2: all servers, 1: official servers, 0: none)

cl_lagcompensation_test_target.title: cl_lagcompensation_test_target
cl_lagcompensation_test_target.description: Player whose head is tracked to test lag compensation.

cl_latch_report.title: cl_latch_report
cl_latch_report.description: Enable to output stats about latching

cl_log_tick.title: cl_log_tick
cl_log_tick.description: Log when a tick is received

cl_log_tick_skips.title: cl_log_tick_skips
cl_log_tick_skips.description: Log when the tick delta >= this

cl_mouselook.title: cl_mouselook
cl_mouselook.description: Set to 1 to use mouse for look, 0 for keyboard look. Cannot be set while connected to a server.

cl_mute_all_but_friends_and_party.title: cl_mute_all_but_friends_and_party
cl_mute_all_but_friends_and_party.description: Only allow communication from friends and matchmaking party members. Set to 1 to apply the in non-competitive game modes. Set to 2 will apply the setting in all modes.

cl_mute_enemy_team.title: cl_mute_enemy_team
cl_mute_enemy_team.description: Block all communication from players on the enemy team.

cl_mute_player_after_reporting_abuse.title: cl_mute_player_after_reporting_abuse
cl_mute_player_after_reporting_abuse.description: Mute players reported for abuse automatically.

cl_net_buffer_ticks.title: cl_net_buffer_ticks
cl_net_buffer_ticks.description: Number of ticks of delay for server snapshots and user commands.  This value controls the value of cl_interp_ratio, which you should not modify directly.

cl_net_buffer_ticks_use_interp.title: cl_net_buffer_ticks_use_interp
cl_net_buffer_ticks_use_interp.description: If false, we smooth over packet loss by adjusting the clock synchronization to buffer packets.  If true, we process packets immediately and use cl_interp to delay their effects

cl_net_showevents.title: cl_net_showevents
cl_net_showevents.description: Dump game events to console (1=client only, 2=all).

cl_new_user_phase.title: cl_new_user_phase
cl_new_user_phase.description: 0: Not Started, 1: Needs Training, 2: Training Complete, -1: Disabled

cl_obs_interp_dist_to_turn_to_face.title: cl_obs_interp_dist_to_turn_to_face
cl_obs_interp_dist_to_turn_to_face.description: Changing to a target further than this will cause the camera to face the direction of travel

cl_observed_bot_crosshair.title: cl_observed_bot_crosshair
cl_observed_bot_crosshair.description: Control the crosshair shown when observing a bot. 0: Show player crosshair. 1: Show player crosshair only when bot can be taken over, otherwise show default.. 2: Always show default crosshair for bots.

cl_panel_freeze_time_after_press.title: cl_panel_freeze_time_after_press
cl_panel_freeze_time_after_press.description: time to freeze mouse/pointer motion after a mouse button press

cl_parallel_readpacketentities.title: cl_parallel_readpacketentities
cl_parallel_readpacketentities.description: Set to 1 to use threading snapshot reading (if game supports and server is sending bitcounts).

cl_parallel_readpacketentities_threshold.title: cl_parallel_readpacketentities_threshold
cl_parallel_readpacketentities_threshold.description: Use parallel processing of snapshot reading if above this many entries.

cl_pdump.title: cl_pdump
cl_pdump.description: Dump info about this entity to screen.

cl_phys_debug_callback_entities.title: cl_phys_debug_callback_entities
cl_phys_debug_callback_entities.description: Print all entities that get touch callbacks. Each entity is printed only once.

cl_phys_sleep_enable.title: cl_phys_sleep_enable
cl_phys_sleep_enable.description: Enable sleeping for dynamic physics bodies.

cl_ping_fade_deadzone.title: cl_ping_fade_deadzone
cl_ping_fade_deadzone.description: Distance from the crosshair over which the ping is completely invisible

cl_ping_fade_distance.title: cl_ping_fade_distance
cl_ping_fade_distance.description: Distance from the crosshair over which the ping fades

cl_playback_screenshots.title: cl_playback_screenshots
cl_playback_screenshots.description: Allows the client to playback screenshot and jpeg commands in demos.

cl_player_ping_mute.title: cl_player_ping_mute
cl_player_ping_mute.description: If 1, player pinging will make a sound, if 0, pings will be silent

cl_player_visibility_far.title: cl_player_visibility_far
cl_player_visibility_far.description: distance at which proxy scale is maximized

cl_player_visibility_far_scale.title: cl_player_visibility_far_scale
cl_player_visibility_far_scale.description: proxy scale multiplier at max dist (is 1.0 at mindist)

cl_poll_network_early.title: cl_poll_network_early
cl_poll_network_early.description: Enable polling for network messages every frame, instead of every tick

cl_pred_build_verbose.title: cl_pred_build_verbose
cl_pred_build_verbose.description: Verbose spew when building prediction optimized data runs.

cl_pred_checkstuck.title: cl_pred_checkstuck
cl_pred_checkstuck.description: Perform the additional 'stuck' traces on the client side during prediction.

cl_pred_optimize.title: cl_pred_optimize
cl_pred_optimize.description: Optimize for not copying data if didn't receive a network update (1), and also for not repredicting if there were no errors (2).

cl_pred_print_every_cmd.title: cl_pred_print_every_cmd
cl_pred_print_every_cmd.description: Print something every time we predict a command

cl_predict_after_every_createmove.title: cl_predict_after_every_createmove
cl_predict_after_every_createmove.description: run prediction after every CreateMove instead of only after CreateMove for the final tick in a frame.

cl_radar_always_centered.title: cl_radar_always_centered
cl_radar_always_centered.description: If set to 0, the radar is maximally used. Otherwise the player is always centered, even at map extents.

cl_radar_fast_transforms.title: cl_radar_fast_transforms
cl_radar_fast_transforms.description: Faster way of placing icons on the mini map.

cl_radar_icon_scale_min.title: cl_radar_icon_scale_min
cl_radar_icon_scale_min.description: Sets the minimum icon scale. Valid values are 0.4 to 1.25.

cl_radar_scale.title: cl_radar_scale
cl_radar_scale.description: Sets the radar scale. Valid values are 0.25 to 1.0.

cl_radar_scale_alternate.title: cl_radar_scale_alternate
cl_radar_scale_alternate.description: Sets the alternate radar scale. Valid values are 0.25 to 1.0.

cl_radar_scale_dynamic.title: cl_radar_scale_dynamic
cl_radar_scale_dynamic.description: Toggles between a radar that scales dynamically to encompass all the detected elements on the map.

cl_radar_square_with_scoreboard.title: cl_radar_square_with_scoreboard
cl_radar_square_with_scoreboard.description: If set, the radar will toggle to square when the scoreboard is visible.

cl_radial_coyote_time.title: cl_radial_coyote_time
cl_radial_coyote_time.description: Selection lenience: How long in seconds the last selected radial segment is used if no segment is selected.

cl_radial_menu_tap_duration.title: cl_radial_menu_tap_duration
cl_radial_menu_tap_duration.description: If nothing in a radial menu is selected, and the button engaging the radial menu is released within this duration, fallback on the radial's tap functionality

cl_radial_radio_tap_to_ping.title: cl_radial_radio_tap_to_ping
cl_radial_radio_tap_to_ping.description: When tapping the radial radio button, leave a ping if nothing is selected within the time in seconds set in cl_radial_menu_tap_duration

cl_ragdoll_limit.description: Maximum number of ragdolls to show (-1 disables limit)

cl_ragdoll_workaround_threshold.title: cl_ragdoll_workaround_threshold
cl_ragdoll_workaround_threshold.description: Mainly cosmetic, client-only effect: when client doesn't know the last position of another player that spawns a ragdoll, the ragdoll creation is simplified and ragdoll is created in the right place. If you increase this significantly, ragdoll positions on your client may be dramatically wrong, but it won't affect other clients

cl_random_taser_bone_y.title: cl_random_taser_bone_y
cl_random_taser_bone_y.description: The Y position used for the random taser force.

cl_random_taser_force_y.title: cl_random_taser_force_y
cl_random_taser_force_y.description: The Y position used for the random taser force.

cl_random_taser_power.title: cl_random_taser_power
cl_random_taser_power.description: Power used when applying the taser effect.

cl_rebuy.title: cl_rebuy
cl_rebuy.description: The order in which rebuy will attempt to repurchase items

cl_resend.title: cl_resend
cl_resend.description: Delay in seconds before the client will resend the 'connect' attempt

cl_retire_low_priority_lights.title: cl_retire_low_priority_lights
cl_retire_low_priority_lights.description: Low priority dlights are replaced by high priority ones

cl_sanitize_muted_players.title: cl_sanitize_muted_players
cl_sanitize_muted_players.description: Hide names and avatars of muted players.

cl_sanitize_player_names.title: cl_sanitize_player_names
cl_sanitize_player_names.description: Replace names of other players with something non-offensive.

cl_sceneentity_debug.title: cl_sceneentity_debug
cl_sceneentity_debug.description: Display all thinking scene entities and its data.

cl_scoreboard_mouse_enable_binding.title: cl_scoreboard_mouse_enable_binding
cl_scoreboard_mouse_enable_binding.description: Name of the binding to enable mouse selection in the scoreboard

cl_screenmessage_notifytime.title: cl_screenmessage_notifytime
cl_screenmessage_notifytime.description: How long to display screen message text

cl_server_graphic1_enable.title: cl_server_graphic1_enable
cl_server_graphic1_enable.description: When enabled, 360x60 (<16kb) image file will be displayed to on-server spectators.

cl_server_graphic2_enable.title: cl_server_graphic2_enable
cl_server_graphic2_enable.description: When enabled, 220x45 (<16kb) image file will be displayed to on-server spectators.

cl_show_clan_in_death_notice.title: cl_show_clan_in_death_notice
cl_show_clan_in_death_notice.description: Is set, the clan name will show next to player names in the death notices.

cl_show_observer_crosshair.title: cl_show_observer_crosshair
cl_show_observer_crosshair.description: Show the crosshair of the player being observed. 0: off 1: friends and party 2: everyone

cl_show_playernames_max_chars_console.title: cl_show_playernames_max_chars_console
cl_show_playernames_max_chars_console.description: Shows all player names (including bots) as 16 W's.

cl_showdemooverlay.title: cl_showdemooverlay
cl_showdemooverlay.description: How often to flash demo recording/playback overlay (0 - disable overlay, -1 - show always)

cl_showerror.title: cl_showerror
cl_showerror.description: Show prediction errors, 2 for above plus detailed field deltas, 3 to filter out serverside known prediction errors, -entindex for specific entity.

cl_showfps.title: cl_showfps
cl_showfps.description: Draw fps meter at top of screen (1 = fps, 2 = smooth fps, 3 = server MS, 4 = Show FPS and Log to file )

cl_showmem.title: cl_showmem
cl_showmem.description: Draw approximate memory use at top of screen

cl_showpos.title: cl_showpos
cl_showpos.description: Draw current position at top of screen

cl_showtextmsg.title: cl_showtextmsg
cl_showtextmsg.description: Enable/disable text messages printing on the screen.

cl_silencer_mode.title: cl_silencer_mode
cl_silencer_mode.description: 0: cannot detach; 1: press secondary fire to detach

cl_skeleton_instance_smear_boneflags.title: cl_skeleton_instance_smear_boneflags
cl_skeleton_instance_smear_boneflags.description: Smear boneflags across the model.  Costs computation, but tests to make sure your bone flags are consistent.

cl_skip_hierarchy_update_for_unchanged_e.title: cl_skip_hierarchy_update_for_unchanged_entities
cl_skip_hierarchy_update_for_unchanged_e.description: Skip updating hierarchy information in PostDataUpdate for entities that have not changed

cl_smooth.title: cl_smooth
cl_smooth.description: Smooth view/eye origin after prediction errors

cl_smoothtime.title: cl_smoothtime
cl_smoothtime.description: Smooth client's view after prediction error over this many seconds

cl_snd_new_visualize.title: cl_snd_new_visualize
cl_snd_new_visualize.description: Displays soundevent name played at it's 3d position

cl_spawngroup_log.title: cl_spawngroup_log
cl_spawngroup_log.description: Dump the contents of the next spawngroup manifest to file.

cl_spec_show_bindings.title: cl_spec_show_bindings
cl_spec_show_bindings.description: Toggle the visibility of the spectator bindings.

cl_streams_image_sfurl.title: cl_streams_image_sfurl
cl_streams_image_sfurl.description: Format of Scaleform image representing the stream

cl_streams_refresh_interval.title: cl_streams_refresh_interval
cl_streams_refresh_interval.description: How often to refresh streams list

cl_streams_request_url.title: cl_streams_request_url
cl_streams_request_url.description: Number of streams requested for display

cl_streams_write_response_file.title: cl_streams_write_response_file
cl_streams_write_response_file.description: When set will save streams info file for diagnostics

cl_teamid_overhead_colors_show.title: cl_teamid_overhead_colors_show
cl_teamid_overhead_colors_show.description: Show team overhead id in teammate color

cl_teamid_overhead_fade_near_crosshair.title: cl_teamid_overhead_fade_near_crosshair
cl_teamid_overhead_fade_near_crosshair.description: The amount to fade teamid when near the crosshair. Range is 0.0-1.0. 0: off

cl_teamid_overhead_maxdist.title: cl_teamid_overhead_maxdist
cl_teamid_overhead_maxdist.description: max distance at which the overhead team id icons will show

cl_teamid_overhead_maxdist_spec.title: cl_teamid_overhead_maxdist_spec
cl_teamid_overhead_maxdist_spec.description: max distance at which the overhead team id icons will show when a spectator

cl_teamid_overhead_mode.title: cl_teamid_overhead_mode
cl_teamid_overhead_mode.description: Always show team id over teammates. 0 = off, 1 = pips; 2 = +name, 3 = +equipment

cl_teammate_colors_show.title: cl_teammate_colors_show
cl_teammate_colors_show.description: In competitive, 1 = show teammates as separate colors in the radar, scoreboard, etc., 2 = show colors and letters

cl_tickpacket_desired_queuelength.title: cl_tickpacket_desired_queuelength
cl_tickpacket_desired_queuelength.description: This value, multiplied by the tick interval, is added to cl_tickpacket_recvmargin_desired to obtain the effective desired recv margin.

cl_tickpacket_recvmargin_adjust_limit.title: cl_tickpacket_recvmargin_adjust_limit
cl_tickpacket_recvmargin_adjust_limit.description: Recvmargin-based usercommand pacing will not speed up or slow down command pacing by more than N% compared to realtime

cl_tickpacket_recvmargin_desired.title: cl_tickpacket_recvmargin_desired
cl_tickpacket_recvmargin_desired.description: Recvmargin-based usercommand pacing will try to maintain N ms margin between user command arriving at the server and the server needing that user command.  See also cl_tickpacket_desired_queuelength.

cl_tickpacket_recvmargin_minsamples.title: cl_tickpacket_recvmargin_minsamples
cl_tickpacket_recvmargin_minsamples.description: Recvmargin-based usercommand pacing will not take action unless we have N samples

cl_tickpacket_recvmargin_timeconstant.title: cl_tickpacket_recvmargin_timeconstant
cl_tickpacket_recvmargin_timeconstant.description: Recvmargin-based usercommand pacing will remove 63.2% of the error in N seconds

cl_tickpacket_recvmargin_window.title: cl_tickpacket_recvmargin_window
cl_tickpacket_recvmargin_window.description: Recvmargin-based usercommand pacing will use past N seconds

cl_tickpacket_send_every_tick.title: cl_tickpacket_send_every_tick

mp_dm_time_between_bonus_min.title: mp_dm_time_between_bonus_min

mp_dogtag_despawn_on_killer_death.title: mp_dogtag_despawn_on_killer_death
mp_dogtag_despawn_on_killer_death.description: Whether dogtags should despawn when their killer dies

mp_dogtag_despawn_time.title: mp_dogtag_despawn_time
mp_dogtag_despawn_time.description: How many seconds dogtags should stay around before despawning automatically (0 = infinite)

mp_dogtag_pickup_rule.title: mp_dogtag_pickup_rule
mp_dogtag_pickup_rule.description: Who is eligible to pick up a dogtag (0 = killer only, 1 = killer's team, 2 = victim's team, 3 = killer & victim's team, 4 = anyone)

mp_economy_reset_rounds.title: mp_economy_reset_rounds
mp_economy_reset_rounds.description: Reset all player money every N rounds (0 for never)

mp_endmatch_votenextleveltime.title: mp_endmatch_votenextleveltime
mp_endmatch_votenextleveltime.description: If mp_endmatch_votenextmap is set, players have this much time to vote on the next map at match end.

mp_endmatch_votenextmap.title: mp_endmatch_votenextmap
mp_endmatch_votenextmap.description: Whether or not players vote for the next map at the end of the match when the final scoreboard comes up

mp_endmatch_votenextmap_keepcurrent.title: mp_endmatch_votenextmap_keepcurrent
mp_endmatch_votenextmap_keepcurrent.description: If set, keeps the current map in the list of voting options.  If not set, the current map will not appear in the list of voting options.

mp_endmatch_votenextmap_wargames_modes.title: mp_endmatch_votenextmap_wargames_modes
mp_endmatch_votenextmap_wargames_modes.description: Modes available for endmatch voting during War Games. Separate names with spaces.

mp_endmatch_votenextmap_wargames_nummaps.title: mp_endmatch_votenextmap_wargames_nummaps
mp_endmatch_votenextmap_wargames_nummaps.description: Maximum number of maps to include in endmatch voting during War Games

mp_endmatch_votenextmap_wargames_nummode.title: mp_endmatch_votenextmap_wargames_nummodes
mp_endmatch_votenextmap_wargames_nummode.description: Maximum number of other War Games to include in endmatch voting during War Games

mp_endwarmup_player_count.title: mp_endwarmup_player_count
mp_endwarmup_player_count.description: Number of players required to be connected to end warmup early. 0 to require maximum players for mode.

mp_equipment_reset_rounds.title: mp_equipment_reset_rounds
mp_equipment_reset_rounds.description: Reset all player equipment every N rounds (0 for never)

mp_fadetoblack.title: mp_fadetoblack
mp_fadetoblack.description: fade a player's screen to black when he dies

mp_fists_replace_melee.title: mp_fists_replace_melee
mp_fists_replace_melee.description: If enabled then when melee weapon is dropped player will have fists, when melee weapon is picked up then fists are unavailable

mp_flinch_punch_scale.title: mp_flinch_punch_scale
mp_flinch_punch_scale.description: Scalar for first person view punch when getting hit.

mp_footsteps_serverside.title: mp_footsteps_serverside
mp_footsteps_serverside.description: Makes the server always play footstep sounds. Clients never calculate footstep sounds locally, instead relying on the server.

mp_force_pick_time.title: mp_force_pick_time
mp_force_pick_time.description: The amount of time a player has on the team screen to make a selection before being auto-teamed

mp_forcecamera.title: mp_forcecamera
mp_forcecamera.description: Restricts spectator modes for dead players

mp_free_armor.title: mp_free_armor
mp_free_armor.description: Determines whether kevlar (1+) and/or helmet (2+) are given automatically.

mp_freezetime.title: mp_freezetime
mp_freezetime.description: how many seconds to keep players frozen when the round starts

mp_friendlyfire.title: mp_friendlyfire
mp_friendlyfire.description: Allows team members to injure other members of their team

mp_give_player_c4.title: mp_give_player_c4
mp_give_player_c4.description: Whether this map should spawn a c4 bomb for a player or not.

mp_global_damage_per_second.title: mp_global_damage_per_second
mp_global_damage_per_second.description: If above 0, deal non-lethal damage to players over time.

mp_guardian_bomb_plant_custom_x_mark_loc.title: mp_guardian_bomb_plant_custom_x_mark_location
mp_guardian_bomb_plant_custom_x_mark_loc.description: x,y,z to display an X for the bomb plant in guardian missions with custom bomb plant boundaries.

mp_guardian_force_collect_hostages_timeo.title: mp_guardian_force_collect_hostages_timeout
mp_guardian_force_collect_hostages_timeo.description: Force bots to collect hostages after this amount of time if no enemy has been seen.

mp_guardian_target_site.title: mp_guardian_target_site
mp_guardian_target_site.description: If set to the index of a bombsite, will cause random spawns to be only created near that site.

mp_halftime.title: mp_halftime
mp_halftime.description: Determines whether the match switches sides in a halftime event.

mp_halftime_duration.title: mp_halftime_duration
mp_halftime_duration.description: Target number of seconds that halftime lasts; shortened if team intros are active

mp_halftime_pausematch.title: mp_halftime_pausematch
mp_halftime_pausematch.description: Set to 1 to pause match after halftime countdown elapses. Match must be resumed by vote or admin.

mp_halftime_pausetimer.title: mp_halftime_pausetimer
mp_halftime_pausetimer.description: Set to 1 to stay in halftime indefinitely. Set to 0 to resume the timer.

mp_heavyassaultsuit_aimpunch.title: mp_heavyassaultsuit_aimpunch
mp_heavyassaultsuit_aimpunch.description: How much EXTRA aim punch will happen when a player wearing the assault suit gets when shot

mp_heavyassaultsuit_deploy_timescale.title: mp_heavyassaultsuit_deploy_timescale
mp_heavyassaultsuit_deploy_timescale.description: How fast a player wearing the heavy assault suit will draw their weapon (1.0 = normal speed, 0.5 = half speed)

mp_heavyassaultsuit_speed.title: mp_heavyassaultsuit_speed
mp_heavyassaultsuit_speed.description: The max speed of a player when they are wearing the heavy assault suit

mp_heavybot_damage_reduction_scale.title: mp_heavybot_damage_reduction_scale
mp_heavybot_damage_reduction_scale.description: How much damage should scale when the player wearing the heavy assault suit is shot (1.0 = no change, 0.5 = half damage)

mp_hostages_max.title: mp_hostages_max
mp_hostages_max.description: Maximum number of hostages to spawn.

mp_hostages_rescuetime.title: mp_hostages_rescuetime
mp_hostages_rescuetime.description: Additional time added to round time if a hostage is reached by a CT.

mp_hostages_rescuetowin.title: mp_hostages_rescuetowin
mp_hostages_rescuetowin.description: 0 == all alive, any other number is the number the CT's need to rescue to win the round.

mp_hostages_run_speed_modifier.title: mp_hostages_run_speed_modifier
mp_hostages_run_speed_modifier.description: Default is 1.0, slow down hostages by setting this to < 1.0.

mp_hostages_spawn_farthest.title: mp_hostages_spawn_farthest
mp_hostages_spawn_farthest.description: When enabled will consistently force the farthest hostages to spawn.

mp_hostages_spawn_force_positions.title: mp_hostages_spawn_force_positions
mp_hostages_spawn_force_positions.description: Comma separated list of zero based indices to force spawn positions, e.g. '0,2' or '1,6'

mp_hostages_spawn_force_positions_xyz.title: mp_hostages_spawn_force_positions_xyz
mp_hostages_spawn_force_positions_xyz.description: Comma separated list of xyz locations to force spawn positions, e.g. 'x1 y1 z1,x2 y2 z2'

mp_hostages_spawn_same_every_round.title: mp_hostages_spawn_same_every_round
mp_hostages_spawn_same_every_round.description: 0 = spawn hostages randomly every round, 1 = same spawns for entire match.

mp_hostages_takedamage.title: mp_hostages_takedamage
mp_hostages_takedamage.description: Whether or not hostages can be hurt.

mp_humanteam.title: mp_humanteam
mp_humanteam.description: Restricts human players to a single team {any, CT, T}

mp_ignore_round_win_conditions.title: mp_ignore_round_win_conditions
mp_ignore_round_win_conditions.description: Ignore conditions which would end the current round

mp_items_prohibited.title: mp_items_prohibited
mp_items_prohibited.description: Set this convar to a comma-delimited list of definition indices of weapons that should be prohibited from use.

mp_join_grace_time.title: mp_join_grace_time
mp_join_grace_time.description: Number of seconds after round start to allow a player to join a game

mp_limitteams.title: mp_limitteams
mp_limitteams.description: Max # of players 1 team can have over another (0 disables check)

mp_logdetail_items.title: mp_logdetail_items
mp_logdetail_items.description: Logs a line any time a player acquires or loses an item.

mp_match_can_clinch.title: mp_match_can_clinch
mp_match_can_clinch.description: Can a team clinch and end the match by being so far ahead that the other team has no way to catching up?

mp_match_end_changelevel.title: mp_match_end_changelevel
mp_match_end_changelevel.description: At the end of the match, perform a changelevel even if next map is the same

mp_match_end_restart.title: mp_match_end_restart
mp_match_end_restart.description: At the end of the match, perform a restart instead of loading a new map

mp_match_restart_delay.title: mp_match_restart_delay
mp_match_restart_delay.description: Time (in seconds) until a match restarts.

mp_max_armor.title: mp_max_armor
mp_max_armor.description: Determines the highest level of armor allowed to be purchased. (0) None, (1) Kevlar, (2) Helmet

mp_maxmoney.title: mp_maxmoney
mp_maxmoney.description: maximum amount of money allowed in a player's account

mp_maxrounds.title: mp_maxrounds
mp_maxrounds.description: max number of rounds to play before server changes maps

mp_min_halftime_duration.title: mp_min_halftime_duration
mp_min_halftime_duration.description: Minimum number of seconds that halftime lasts even if team intros are active

mp_overtime_enable.title: mp_overtime_enable
mp_overtime_enable.description: If a match ends in a tie, use overtime rules to determine winner

mp_overtime_halftime_pausetimer.title: mp_overtime_halftime_pausetimer
mp_overtime_halftime_pausetimer.description: If set to 1 will set mp_halftime_pausetimer to 1 before every half of overtime. Set mp_halftime_pausetimer to 0 to resume the timer.

mp_overtime_limit.title: mp_overtime_limit
mp_overtime_limit.description: When overtime is enabled, only so many overtimes can be played

mp_overtime_maxrounds.title: mp_overtime_maxrounds
mp_overtime_maxrounds.description: When overtime is enabled play additional rounds to determine winner

mp_overtime_startmoney.title: mp_overtime_startmoney
mp_overtime_startmoney.description: Money assigned to all players at start of every overtime half

mp_playercashawards.title: mp_playercashawards
mp_playercashawards.description: Players can earn money by performing in-game actions

mp_playerid.title: mp_playerid
mp_playerid.description: Controls what information player see in the status bar: 0 all names; 1 team names; 2 no names

mp_playerid_delay.title: mp_playerid_delay
mp_playerid_delay.description: Number of seconds to delay showing information in the status bar

mp_playerid_hold.title: mp_playerid_hold
mp_playerid_hold.description: Number of seconds to keep showing old information in the status bar

mp_promoted_item_enabled.title: mp_promoted_item_enabled
mp_promoted_item_enabled.description: Allow the purchasing of the promoted item.

mp_randomspawn.title: mp_randomspawn
mp_randomspawn.description: Determines whether players are to spawn. 0 = default; 1 = both teams; 2 = Terrorists; 3 = CTs.

mp_randomspawn_dist.title: mp_randomspawn_dist
mp_randomspawn_dist.description: If using mp_randomspawn, determines whether to test distance when selecting this spot.

mp_randomspawn_los.title: mp_randomspawn_los
mp_randomspawn_los.description: If using mp_randomspawn, determines whether to test Line of Sight when spawning.

mp_require_gun_use_to_acquire.title: mp_require_gun_use_to_acquire
mp_require_gun_use_to_acquire.description: Whether guns must be +used to acquire or default is touch-to-pickup

mp_respawn_immunitytime.title: mp_respawn_immunitytime
mp_respawn_immunitytime.description: How many seconds after respawn immunity lasts. Set to negative value to disable warmup immunity.

mp_respawn_on_death_ct.title: mp_respawn_on_death_ct
mp_respawn_on_death_ct.description: When set to 1, counter-terrorists will respawn after dying.

mp_respawn_on_death_t.title: mp_respawn_on_death_t
mp_respawn_on_death_t.description: When set to 1, terrorists will respawn after dying.

mp_respawnwavetime_ct.title: mp_respawnwavetime_ct
mp_respawnwavetime_ct.description: Time between respawn waves for CTs.

mp_respawnwavetime_t.title: mp_respawnwavetime_t
mp_respawnwavetime_t.description: Time between respawn waves for Terrorists.

mp_restartgame.title: mp_restartgame

mp_retake_ct_count.title: mp_retake_ct_count
mp_retake_ct_count.description: Number of CT's when playing retakes.

mp_retake_ct_loadout_bonus_card.title: mp_retake_ct_loadout_bonus_card

mp_retake_ct_loadout_bonus_card_availabi.title: mp_retake_ct_loadout_bonus_card_availability
mp_retake_ct_loadout_bonus_card_availabi.description: CT bonus card availability pattern for full buy round when playing bomb site retake.

mp_retake_ct_loadout_default_pistol_roun.title: mp_retake_ct_loadout_default_pistol_round
mp_retake_ct_loadout_default_pistol_roun.description: CT Loadouts for default pistol round when playing bomb site retake.

mp_retake_ct_loadout_enemy_card.title: mp_retake_ct_loadout_enemy_card
mp_retake_ct_loadout_enemy_card.description: CT enemy card for full buy round when playing bomb site retake.

mp_retake_ct_loadout_full_buy_round.title: mp_retake_ct_loadout_full_buy_round
mp_retake_ct_loadout_full_buy_round.description: CT Loadouts for full buy round when playing bomb site retake.

mp_retake_ct_loadout_light_buy_round.title: mp_retake_ct_loadout_light_buy_round
mp_retake_ct_loadout_light_buy_round.description: CT Loadouts for force buy round when playing bomb site retake.

mp_retake_ct_loadout_upgraded_pistol_rou.title: mp_retake_ct_loadout_upgraded_pistol_round
mp_retake_ct_loadout_upgraded_pistol_rou.description: CT Loadouts for upgraded pistol round when playing bomb site retake.

mp_retake_max_consecutive_rounds_same_ta.title: mp_retake_max_consecutive_rounds_same_target_site
mp_retake_max_consecutive_rounds_same_ta.description: Limit the number of consecutive rounds targeting the same site.

mp_retake_t_count.title: mp_retake_t_count
mp_retake_t_count.description: Number of terrorists when playing retakes.

mp_retake_t_loadout_bonus_card.title: mp_retake_t_loadout_bonus_card
mp_retake_t_loadout_bonus_card.description: T bonus card for full buy round when playing bomb site retake.

mp_retake_t_loadout_bonus_card_availabil.title: mp_retake_t_loadout_bonus_card_availability
mp_retake_t_loadout_bonus_card_availabil.description: T bonus card availability pattern for full buy round when playing bomb site retake.

mp_retake_t_loadout_default_pistol_round.title: mp_retake_t_loadout_default_pistol_round
mp_retake_t_loadout_default_pistol_round.description: T Loadouts for default pistol round when playing bomb site retake.

mp_retake_t_loadout_enemy_card.title: mp_retake_t_loadout_enemy_card
mp_retake_t_loadout_enemy_card.description: T enemy card for full buy round when playing bomb site retake.

mp_retake_t_loadout_full_buy_round.title: mp_retake_t_loadout_full_buy_round
mp_retake_t_loadout_full_buy_round.description: T Loadouts for full buy round when playing bomb site retake.

mp_retake_t_loadout_light_buy_round.title: mp_retake_t_loadout_light_buy_round
mp_retake_t_loadout_light_buy_round.description: T Loadouts for force buy round when playing bomb site retake.

mp_retake_t_loadout_upgraded_pistol_roun.title: mp_retake_t_loadout_upgraded_pistol_round
mp_retake_t_loadout_upgraded_pistol_roun.description: T Loadouts for upgraded pistol round when playing bomb site retake.

mp_round_restart_delay.title: mp_round_restart_delay
mp_round_restart_delay.description: Number of seconds to delay before restarting a round after a win

mp_roundtime.title: mp_roundtime
mp_roundtime.description: How many minutes each round takes.

mp_roundtime_defuse.title: mp_roundtime_defuse
mp_roundtime_defuse.description: How many minutes each round of Bomb Defuse takes. If 0 then use mp_roundtime instead.

mp_roundtime_hostage.title: mp_roundtime_hostage
mp_roundtime_hostage.description: How many minutes each round of Hostage Rescue takes. If 0 then use mp_roundtime instead.

mp_shield_speed_deployed.title: mp_shield_speed_deployed
mp_shield_speed_deployed.description: The max speed of a player when they have a shield deployed

mp_shield_speed_holstered.title: mp_shield_speed_holstered
mp_shield_speed_holstered.description: The max speed of a player when they have a shield holstered

mp_shorthanded_cash_bonus_ignore_kicked.title: mp_shorthanded_cash_bonus_ignore_kicked
mp_shorthanded_cash_bonus_ignore_kicked.description: Determines whether kicked players are included in the assessment for short-handedness

mp_shorthanded_cash_bonus_round_delay.title: mp_shorthanded_cash_bonus_round_delay
mp_shorthanded_cash_bonus_round_delay.description: number of previous rounds that a team needs to have been shorthanded before they are eligible for the short-handed bonus

mp_solid_teammates.title: mp_solid_teammates
mp_solid_teammates.description: How solid are teammates: 0 = transparent; 1 = fully solid; 2 = can stand on top of heads

mp_spawnprotectiontime.title: mp_spawnprotectiontime
mp_spawnprotectiontime.description: Kick players who team-kill within this many seconds of a round restart.

mp_spectators_max.title: mp_spectators_max
mp_spectators_max.description: How many spectators are allowed in a match.

mp_starting_losses.title: mp_starting_losses
mp_starting_losses.description: Determines what the initial loss streak is.

mp_startmoney.title: mp_startmoney
mp_startmoney.description: amount of money each player gets when they reset

mp_t_default_grenades.title: mp_t_default_grenades
mp_t_default_grenades.description: The default grenades that the Ts will spawn with.	To give multiple grenades, separate each weapon class with a space like this: 'weapon_molotov weapon_hegrenade'

mp_t_default_melee.title: mp_t_default_melee
mp_t_default_melee.description: The default melee weapon that the Ts will spawn with

mp_t_default_primary.title: mp_t_default_primary
mp_t_default_primary.description: The default primary (rifle) weapon that the Ts will spawn with

mp_t_default_secondary.title: mp_t_default_secondary
mp_t_default_secondary.description: The default secondary (pistol) weapon that the Ts will spawn with

mp_tagging_scale.title: mp_tagging_scale
mp_tagging_scale.description: Scalar for player tagging modifier when hit. Lower values for greater tagging.

mp_taser_recharge_time.title: mp_taser_recharge_time
mp_taser_recharge_time.description: Determines recharge time for taser. -1 = disabled.

mp_td_dmgtokick.title: mp_td_dmgtokick
mp_td_dmgtokick.description: The damage threshhold players have to exceed in a match to get kicked.

mp_td_dmgtowarn.title: mp_td_dmgtowarn
mp_td_dmgtowarn.description: The damage threshhold players have to exceed in a match to get warned that they are about to be kicked.

mp_td_spawndmgthreshold.title: mp_td_spawndmgthreshold
mp_td_spawndmgthreshold.description: The damage threshold players have to exceed at the start of the round to be warned/kick.

mp_team_intro_time.title: mp_team_intro_time
mp_team_intro_time.description: How many seconds for team intro

mp_team_timeout_max.title: mp_team_timeout_max
mp_team_timeout_max.description: Number of timeouts each team gets per match.

mp_team_timeout_ot_add_each.title: mp_team_timeout_ot_add_each
mp_team_timeout_ot_add_each.description: Number of timeouts to add for each team when match goes to 2nd and each next overtime.

mp_team_timeout_ot_add_once.title: mp_team_timeout_ot_add_once
mp_team_timeout_ot_add_once.description: Number of timeouts to add for each team when regulation time ends and match goes to overtime.

mp_team_timeout_ot_max.title: mp_team_timeout_ot_max
mp_team_timeout_ot_max.description: Max number of timeouts each team can have per OT after all OT timeouts got added.

mp_teamcashawards.title: mp_teamcashawards
mp_teamcashawards.description: Teams can earn money by performing in-game actions

mp_teamflag_1.title: mp_teamflag_1
mp_teamflag_1.description: Enter a country's alpha 2 code to show that flag next to team 1's name in the spectator scoreboard.

mp_teamflag_2.title: mp_teamflag_2
mp_teamflag_2.description: Enter a country's alpha 2 code to show that flag next to team 2's name in the spectator scoreboard.

mp_teamlogo_1.title: mp_teamlogo_1
mp_teamlogo_1.description: Enter a team's shorthand image name to display their logo. Images can be found here: 'resource/flash/econ/tournaments/teams'

mp_teamlogo_2.title: mp_teamlogo_2
mp_teamlogo_2.description: Enter a team's shorthand image name to display their logo. Images can be found here: 'resource/flash/econ/tournaments/teams'

mp_teammatchstat_1.title: mp_teammatchstat_1
mp_teammatchstat_1.description: A non-empty string sets first team's match stat.

mp_teammatchstat_2.title: mp_teammatchstat_2
mp_teammatchstat_2.description: A non-empty string sets second team's match stat.

mp_teammatchstat_cycletime.title: mp_teammatchstat_cycletime
mp_teammatchstat_cycletime.description: Cycle match stats after so many seconds

mp_teammatchstat_holdtime.title: mp_teammatchstat_holdtime
mp_teammatchstat_holdtime.description: Decide on a match stat and hold it additionally for at least so many seconds

mp_teammatchstat_txt.title: mp_teammatchstat_txt
mp_teammatchstat_txt.description: A non-empty string sets the match stat description, e.g. 'Match 2 of 3'.

mp_teammates_are_enemies.title: mp_teammates_are_enemies
mp_teammates_are_enemies.description: When set, your teammates act as enemies and all players are valid targets.

mp_teamname_1.title: mp_teamname_1
mp_teamname_1.description: A non-empty string overrides the first team's name.

mp_teamname_2.title: mp_teamname_2
mp_teamname_2.description: A non-empty string overrides the second team's name.

mp_teamprediction_pct.title: mp_teamprediction_pct
mp_teamprediction_pct.description: A value between 1 and 99 will show predictions in favor of CT team.

mp_teamprediction_txt.title: mp_teamprediction_txt
mp_teamprediction_txt.description: A value between 1 and 99 will set predictions in favor of first team.

mp_teamscore_1.title: mp_teamscore_1
mp_teamscore_1.description: A non-empty string for best-of-N maps won by the first team.

mp_teamscore_2.title: mp_teamscore_2
mp_teamscore_2.description: A non-empty string for best-of-N maps won by the second team.

mp_teamscore_max.title: mp_teamscore_max
mp_teamscore_max.description: How many maps to win the series (bo3 max=2; bo5 max=3; bo7 max=4)

mp_technical_timeout_duration_s.title: mp_technical_timeout_duration_s
mp_technical_timeout_duration_s.description: How many seconds is a full technical timeout?

mp_technical_timeout_per_team.title: mp_technical_timeout_per_team
mp_technical_timeout_per_team.description: How many technical timeouts are there per team?

mp_timelimit.title: mp_timelimit
mp_timelimit.description: game time per map in minutes

mp_tkpunish.title: mp_tkpunish
mp_tkpunish.description: Will TK'ers and team damagers be punished in the next round?  {0=no,  1=yes}

mp_tournament_whitelist.title: mp_tournament_whitelist
mp_tournament_whitelist.description: Specifies the item whitelist file to use.

mp_use_respawn_waves.title: mp_use_respawn_waves
mp_use_respawn_waves.description: When set to 1, and that player's team is set to respawn, they will respawn in waves. If set to 2, teams will respawn when the whole team is dead.

mp_warmup_items_drop_policy.title: mp_warmup_items_drop_policy
mp_warmup_items_drop_policy.description: Which items can drop during warmup (bitfield, 1=gun, 2=c4, 4=nade, 8=defuser, 16=taser, 32=healthshot)

mp_warmup_items_nocost.title: mp_warmup_items_nocost
mp_warmup_items_nocost.description: Determines whether weapons are free to buy during warmup.

mp_warmup_items_nocount_policy.title: mp_warmup_items_nocount_policy
mp_warmup_items_nocount_policy.description: Which items are unlimited during warmup (bitfield, 1=gun, 2=c4, 4=nade, 8=defuser/kevlar, 16=taser, 32=healthshot)

mp_warmup_offline_enabled.title: mp_warmup_offline_enabled

phys_reload_immediately.description: Set to 1 to reload resources and reconstruct physics of entities on the fly. May unexpectedly change behavior or crash the game, because game code is generally unaware of underlying resource reloads and may hold references to physics that may become invalid during resource reload. It is inherently harder for physics to deal with resource reloads because of persistent nature of objects being simulated (textures can be easily reloaded on the fly; if an entity holds a handle to a ragdoll body part, it may expect that handle to stay valid while the ragdoll exists)
