spec_glow_spike_factor.title: spec_glow_spike_factor
spec_glow_spike_factor.description: Noisy player xray glow scaling (pop when noise is made).  Make >1 to add a 'spike' to noise-making players

spec_glow_spike_time.title: spec_glow_spike_time
spec_glow_spike_time.description: Time for noisy player glow 'spike' to show that they made noise very recently.

spec_lock_to_accountid.title: spec_lock_to_accountid
spec_lock_to_accountid.description: As an observer, lock the spectator target to the given accountid.

spec_replay_bot.title: spec_replay_bot
spec_replay_bot.description: Enable Spectator Hltv Replay when killed by bot

spec_replay_cache_ragdolls.title: spec_replay_cache_ragdolls
spec_replay_cache_ragdolls.description: when set to 0, ragdolls will settle dynamically before and after Killer Replay

spec_replay_colorcorrection.title: spec_replay_colorcorrection
spec_replay_colorcorrection.description: Amount of color correction in deathcam replay

spec_replay_enable.title: spec_replay_enable
spec_replay_enable.description: Enable Killer Replay, requires hltv server running (0:off, 1:default, 2:force)

spec_replay_fadein.title: spec_replay_fadein
spec_replay_fadein.description: Amount of time in seconds it takes to visually fade into replay, or into real-time after replay

spec_replay_fadeout.title: spec_replay_fadeout
spec_replay_fadeout.description: Amount of time in seconds it takes to visually fade out of replay, or out of real-time before replay

spec_replay_fullframe.title: spec_replay_fullframe
spec_replay_fullframe.description: Send full frame on every hltv replay transition

spec_replay_leadup_time.title: spec_replay_leadup_time
spec_replay_leadup_time.description: Replay time in seconds before the highlighted event

spec_replay_message_time.title: spec_replay_message_time
spec_replay_message_time.description: How long to show the message about Killer Replay after death. The best setting is a bit shorter than spec_replay_autostart_delay + spec_replay_leadup_time + spec_replay_winddown_time

spec_replay_on_death.title: spec_replay_on_death
spec_replay_on_death.description: When > 0, sets the mode whereas players see delayed replay, and are segregated into a domain of chat and voice separate from the alive players

spec_replay_others_experimental.title: spec_replay_others_experimental
spec_replay_others_experimental.description: Replay the last death of the round, if possible. Disabled on official servers by default. Experimental.

spec_replay_outline.title: spec_replay_outline
spec_replay_outline.description: Enable outline selecting victim in hltv replay: 0 - none; 1 - ouline YOU; 2 - outline YOU, with red ragdoll outline; 3 - normal spectator outlines

spec_replay_rate_base.title: spec_replay_rate_base
spec_replay_rate_base.description: Base time scale of Killer Replay.Experimental.

spec_replay_rate_limit.title: spec_replay_rate_limit
spec_replay_rate_limit.description: Minimum allowable pause between replay requests in seconds

spec_replay_rate_slowdown.title: spec_replay_rate_slowdown
spec_replay_rate_slowdown.description: The part of Killer Replay right before death is played at this rate

spec_replay_rate_slowdown_length.title: spec_replay_rate_slowdown_length
spec_replay_rate_slowdown_length.description: The part of Killer Replay right before death is played at this rate

spec_replay_review_sound.title: spec_replay_review_sound
spec_replay_review_sound.description: When set to non-0, a sound effect is played during Killer Replay

spec_replay_round_delay.title: spec_replay_round_delay
spec_replay_round_delay.description: Round can be delayed by this much due to someone watching a replay; must be at least 3-4 seconds, otherwise the last replay will always be interrupted by round start, assuming normal pause between round_end and round_start events (7 seconds) and freezecam delay (2 seconds) and 7.4 second full replay (5.4 second pre-death and ~2 seconds post-death) and replay in/out switching (up to a second)

spec_replay_sound_fadein.title: spec_replay_sound_fadein
spec_replay_sound_fadein.description: Amount of time in seconds it takes to fade in the audio before or after replay

spec_replay_sound_fadeout.title: spec_replay_sound_fadeout
spec_replay_sound_fadeout.description: Amount of time in seconds it takes to fade out the audio before or after replay

spec_replay_victim_pov.title: spec_replay_victim_pov
spec_replay_victim_pov.description: Killer Replay - replay from victim's point of view (1); the default is killer's (0). Experimental.

spec_replay_winddown_time.title: spec_replay_winddown_time
spec_replay_winddown_time.description: The trailing time, in seconds, of replay past the event, including fade-out

spec_show_xray.title: spec_show_xray
spec_show_xray.description: If set to 1, you can see player outlines and name IDs through walls - who you can see depends on your team and mode

spec_track.title: spec_track
spec_track.description: Tracks an entity in spec mode

spec_usenumberkeys_nobinds.title: spec_usenumberkeys_nobinds
spec_usenumberkeys_nobinds.description: If set to 1, map voting and spectator view use the raw number keys instead of the weapon binds (slot1, slot2, etc).

ss_mimic.title: ss_mimic
ss_mimic.description: Split screen users mimic base player's CUserCmds

ss_voice_hearpartner.title: ss_voice_hearpartner
ss_voice_hearpartner.description: Route voice between splitscreen players on same system.

stats_collect_gpu.title: stats_collect_gpu
stats_collect_gpu.description: While doing stats_display, collect GPU perf counters. Used for stats_print_gpu.

stats_highlight_interval.title: stats_highlight_interval
stats_highlight_interval.description: Interval between hightlight screens in the transition stats panel

steamworks_sessionid_client.title: steamworks_sessionid_client
steamworks_sessionid_client.description: The client session ID for the new steamworks gamestats.

steamworks_sessionid_lifetime_client.title: steamworks_sessionid_lifetime_client
steamworks_sessionid_lifetime_client.description: The full client session ID for the new steamworks gamestats.

steamworks_sessionid_server.title: steamworks_sessionid_server
steamworks_sessionid_server.description: The server session ID for the new steamworks gamestats.

sticky_tooltips.title: sticky_tooltips
sticky_tooltips.description: Don't ever hide tooltips. Helpful when debugging complicated tooltip layouts.

suspicious_hit_strategy.title: suspicious_hit_strategy
suspicious_hit_strategy.description: What to do about suspicious hits. 0: Nothing. 1: Skip the bullet. 2: Skip the bullet and re-roll a new bullet.

sv_allchat.title: sv_allchat
sv_allchat.description: Players can receive all other players' text chat, no death restrictions

sv_allow_annotations.title: sv_allow_annotations
sv_allow_annotations.description: Allow clients to use the annotation system on the server.

sv_alltalk.title: sv_alltalk
sv_alltalk.description: Players can hear all other players' voice communication, no team restrictions

sv_auto_adjust_bot_difficulty.title: sv_auto_adjust_bot_difficulty
sv_auto_adjust_bot_difficulty.description: Adjust the difficulty of bots each round based on contribution score.

sv_auto_cstrafe_attempt_window.title: sv_auto_cstrafe_attempt_window
sv_auto_cstrafe_attempt_window.description: The length of the window of trailing counter-strafe attempts considered during input automation detection.

sv_auto_cstrafe_kick.title: sv_auto_cstrafe_kick
sv_auto_cstrafe_kick.description: Whether or not to kick players when counter-strafe input automation is detected.

sv_auto_cstrafe_logging.title: sv_auto_cstrafe_logging
sv_auto_cstrafe_logging.description: 0: never, 1: every time counter-strafe input automation is detected, 2: every counter-strafe

sv_auto_cstrafe_lower_overlap_pct_thresh.title: sv_auto_cstrafe_lower_overlap_pct_threshold
sv_auto_cstrafe_lower_overlap_pct_thresh.description: The percentage of overlapping attempts in the attempt window below which input automation detection is triggered at the success threshold.

sv_auto_cstrafe_min_attempts.title: sv_auto_cstrafe_min_attempts
sv_auto_cstrafe_min_attempts.description: The minimum number of counter-strafe attempts required for input automation detection. The player must be moving more than 135.2 units/s for their counter-strafe to be considered an attempt. An attempt is either considered a success (counter-strafing took place within a single tick), an overlap (both directions were held for 1+ ticks) or an underlap (neither direction was held for 1+ ticks).

sv_auto_cstrafe_sequence_length.title: sv_auto_cstrafe_sequence_length
sv_auto_cstrafe_sequence_length.description: The length of sequential counter-strafe attempts evaluated relative to the success threshold. Input automation detection considers the best sequence within the larger attempt window.

sv_auto_cstrafe_success_threshold.title: sv_auto_cstrafe_success_threshold
sv_auto_cstrafe_success_threshold.description: The minimum number of successful counter-strafes within a best sequence that will trigger input automation detection. The number of successes that trigger input automation detection is interpolated between the success threshold and a 'perfect' sequence (all counter-strafes in a sequence are successes), depending on the player's percentage of overlapping counter-strafe attempts.

sv_auto_cstrafe_upper_overlap_pct_thresh.title: sv_auto_cstrafe_upper_overlap_pct_threshold
sv_auto_cstrafe_upper_overlap_pct_thresh.description: The percentage of overlapping attempts in the attempt window below which input automation detection is triggered when all counter-strafes in a sequence are successes.

sv_auto_full_alltalk_during_warmup_half_.title: sv_auto_full_alltalk_during_warmup_half_end
sv_auto_full_alltalk_during_warmup_half_.description: When enabled will automatically turn on full all talk mode in warmup, at halftime and at the end of the match

sv_autobunnyhopping.title: sv_autobunnyhopping
sv_autobunnyhopping.description: Players automatically re-jump while holding jump button

sv_autobuyammo.title: sv_autobuyammo
sv_autobuyammo.description: Enable automatic ammo purchase when inside buy zones during buy periods

sv_autoexec_mapname_cfg.title: sv_autoexec_mapname_cfg
sv_autoexec_mapname_cfg.description: Execute a mapname cfg file on the server automatically in custom game modes that require it.

sv_autosave.title: sv_autosave
sv_autosave.description: Set to 1 to autosave game on level transition. Does not affect autosave triggers.

sv_backspeed.title: sv_backspeed
sv_backspeed.description: How much to slow down backwards motion

sv_bot_buy_decoy_weight.title: sv_bot_buy_decoy_weight
sv_bot_buy_decoy_weight.description: Given a bot will buy a grenade, controls the odds of the grenade type. Proportional to all other sv_bot_buy_*_weight convars.

sv_bot_buy_flash_weight.title: sv_bot_buy_flash_weight
sv_bot_buy_flash_weight.description: Given a bot will buy a grenade, controls the odds of the grenade type. Proportional to all other sv_bot_buy_*_weight convars.

sv_bot_buy_grenade_chance.title: sv_bot_buy_grenade_chance
sv_bot_buy_grenade_chance.description: Chance bots will buy a grenade with leftover money (after prim, sec and armor). Input as percent (0-100.0)

sv_bot_buy_hegrenade_weight.title: sv_bot_buy_hegrenade_weight
sv_bot_buy_hegrenade_weight.description: Given a bot will buy a grenade, controls the odds of the grenade type. Proportional to all other sv_bot_buy_*_weight convars.

sv_bot_buy_molotov_weight.title: sv_bot_buy_molotov_weight
sv_bot_buy_molotov_weight.description: Given a bot will buy a grenade, controls the odds of the grenade type. Proportional to all other sv_bot_buy_*_weight convars.

sv_bot_buy_smoke_weight.title: sv_bot_buy_smoke_weight
sv_bot_buy_smoke_weight.description: Given a bot will buy a grenade, controls the odds of the grenade type. Proportional to all other sv_bot_buy_*_weight convars.

sv_bot_difficulty_kbm.title: sv_bot_difficulty_kbm
sv_bot_difficulty_kbm.description: Bot difficulty while playing with Keyboard/Mouse device

sv_bot_parallel_threat_detection.title: sv_bot_parallel_threat_detection
sv_bot_parallel_threat_detection.description: Perform bot threat detection in parallel

sv_bots_get_easier_each_win.title: sv_bots_get_easier_each_win
sv_bots_get_easier_each_win.description: If > 0, some # of bots will lower thier difficulty each time they win. The argument defines how many will lower their difficulty each time.

sv_bounce.title: sv_bounce
sv_bounce.description: Bounce multiplier for when physically simulated objects collide with other objects.

sv_buy_status_override.title: sv_buy_status_override
sv_buy_status_override.description: Override for buy status map info. 0 = everyone can buy, 1 = ct only, 2 = t only 3 = nobody

sv_c4_center_of_mass_offset.title: sv_c4_center_of_mass_offset
sv_c4_center_of_mass_offset.description: Shifts center-of-mass along z-axis from default

sv_c4_upright_constraint_damping.title: sv_c4_upright_constraint_damping
sv_c4_upright_constraint_damping.description: Controls how much velocity is damped on the constraint. 0 = undamped wobbly spring, 1 = critically damped no wobble fast converge, >1 = over damped

sv_c4_upright_constraint_enabled.title: sv_c4_upright_constraint_enabled
sv_c4_upright_constraint_enabled.description: Use a constraint to keep C4 pointed upright when thrown

sv_client_max_interp_ratio.title: sv_client_max_interp_ratio
sv_client_max_interp_ratio.description: This can be used to limit the value of cl_interp_ratio for connected clients (only while they are connected).

sv_client_min_interp_ratio.title: sv_client_min_interp_ratio
sv_client_min_interp_ratio.description: This can be used to limit the value of cl_interp_ratio for connected clients (only while they are connected).

sv_clockcorrection_msecs.title: sv_clockcorrection_msecs
sv_clockcorrection_msecs.description: The server tries to keep each player's m_nTickBase withing this many msecs of the server absolute tickcount

sv_cluster.title: sv_cluster
sv_cluster.description: Data center cluster this server lives in.

sv_coaching_enabled.title: sv_coaching_enabled
sv_coaching_enabled.description: Allows spectating and communicating with a team ( 'coach t' or 'coach ct' )

sv_competitive_minspec.title: sv_competitive_minspec
sv_competitive_minspec.description: Enable to force certain client convars to minimum/maximum values to help prevent competitive advantages.

sv_compute_per_bot_difficulty.title: sv_compute_per_bot_difficulty
sv_compute_per_bot_difficulty.description: 0 = compute all bot difficulties equally, 1 = compute unique bot difficulty for each bot

sv_condense_late_buttons.title: sv_condense_late_buttons
sv_condense_late_buttons.description: When condensing late commands. Should we compress multiple moves of button presses into the target move?

sv_cq_trim_bloat_remainder.title: sv_cq_trim_bloat_remainder
sv_cq_trim_bloat_remainder.description: When trimming a bloated CQ, leave at least N more commands than the minimum

sv_cq_trim_bloat_space.title: sv_cq_trim_bloat_space
sv_cq_trim_bloat_space.description: When trimming a bloated CQ, try to leave room for N more commands to be added.  0 will trim only what is needed to remove the immediate bloat, a very large value will reset the whole queue.

sv_cq_trim_catchup_remainder.title: sv_cq_trim_catchup_remainder
sv_cq_trim_catchup_remainder.description: When trimming an overful CQ due to app 'catchup' request, leave at least N more commands than the minimum

sv_csgo_shoot_lagcompensation_max_error.title: sv_csgo_shoot_lagcompensation_max_error
sv_csgo_shoot_lagcompensation_max_error.description: Warn if lag compensated head hitbox position doesn't match that on client.

sv_csgo_shoot_verify_on_attack_only.title: sv_csgo_shoot_verify_on_attack_only
sv_csgo_shoot_verify_on_attack_only.description: Only run lag compensation error check when primary attack goes down.

sv_deadtalk.title: sv_deadtalk
sv_deadtalk.description: Dead players can speak (voice, text) to the living

sv_debug_client_not_in_pvs.title: sv_debug_client_not_in_pvs
sv_debug_client_not_in_pvs.description: If set, draw failed client PVS checks with red box

sv_debug_player_use.title: sv_debug_player_use
sv_debug_player_use.description: Visualizes +use logic. Green cross=trace success, Red cross=trace too far, Green box=radius success

sv_deltaticks_enforce.title: sv_deltaticks_enforce
sv_deltaticks_enforce.description: By default, player must ack delta ticks in order. How to enforce it: 2 = kick all clients, 1 = kick only TV clients, 0 = do not kick.

sv_deltaticks_log.title: sv_deltaticks_log
sv_deltaticks_log.description: Whether diagnostic logging is enabled when clients ack delta ticks out of order. Policy: 2 = log all out of order acks, 1 = log only when disconnect is triggered, 0 = do not log.

sv_dev_damage_use_netvars.title: sv_dev_damage_use_netvars
sv_dev_damage_use_netvars.description: Whether we should use network vars (true) or legacy messages (false).

sv_dev_entitydeltapadding_extra_max.title: sv_dev_entitydeltapadding_extra_max
sv_dev_entitydeltapadding_extra_max.description: When encoding entity deltas, append on a random number of extra bytes.  This happens after sv_dev_entitydeltapadding_min_size.

sv_dev_entitydeltapadding_extra_min.title: sv_dev_entitydeltapadding_extra_min
sv_dev_entitydeltapadding_extra_min.description: When encoding entity deltas, append on a random number of extra bytes.  This happens after sv_dev_entitydeltapadding_min_size.

sv_dev_entitydeltapadding_min_size.title: sv_dev_entitydeltapadding_min_size
sv_dev_entitydeltapadding_min_size.description: When encoding entity deltas, if the delta size is < N bytes, then shove in N dummy bytes.  This happens before sv_dev_entitydeltapadding_extra_min/sv_dev_entitydeltapadding_extra_max

sv_disable_immunity_alpha.title: sv_disable_immunity_alpha
sv_disable_immunity_alpha.description: If set, clients won't slam the player model render settings each frame for immunity [mod authors use this]

sv_disable_observer_interpolation.title: sv_disable_observer_interpolation
sv_disable_observer_interpolation.description: Disallow interpolating between observer targets on this server.

sv_disable_radar.title: sv_disable_radar
sv_disable_radar.description: 0: regular radar; 1: always disabled; 2: disabled in warmup

sv_disable_reliable_delta_retransmit.title: sv_disable_reliable_delta_retransmit
sv_disable_reliable_delta_retransmit.description: Assume that a reliable entity delta will be ack'ed and send future deltas relative to the last reliable delta.

sv_disconnected_player_data_hold_time.title: sv_disconnected_player_data_hold_time
sv_disconnected_player_data_hold_time.description: Duration, in seconds, to hold onto the data of disconnected players, for scoreboard display.

sv_disconnected_players_cleanup_delay.title: sv_disconnected_players_cleanup_delay
sv_disconnected_players_cleanup_delay.description: Delay between player disconnecting and their corpse getting cleaned up.

sv_dz_cash_mega_bundle_size.title: sv_dz_cash_mega_bundle_size
sv_dz_cash_mega_bundle_size.description: Size of a mega cash bundle

sv_dz_contractkill_reward.title: sv_dz_contractkill_reward
sv_dz_contractkill_reward.description: Cash bundles to award for a successful contract kill

sv_dz_hostage_rescue_reward.title: sv_dz_hostage_rescue_reward
sv_dz_hostage_rescue_reward.description: Number of cash bundles to award for rescuing a hostage

sv_dz_squad_wipe_reward.title: sv_dz_squad_wipe_reward
sv_dz_squad_wipe_reward.description: Number of cash bundles to award for eliminating a squad

sv_early_network_message_processing.title: sv_early_network_message_processing
sv_early_network_message_processing.description: Processes network messages on the server before entities think, instead of at the end of the tick.

sv_enable_alternate_baselines.title: sv_enable_alternate_baselines
sv_enable_alternate_baselines.description: Allow alternate baseline system, set to 2 for debugging spew.

sv_enable_delta_packing.title: sv_enable_delta_packing

sv_enablebunnyhopping.title: sv_enablebunnyhopping

sv_endmatch_item_drop_interval.description: The time between drops on the end match scoreboard

sv_endmatch_item_drop_interval_ancient.title: sv_endmatch_item_drop_interval_ancient
sv_endmatch_item_drop_interval_ancient.description: The time between drops on the end match scoreboard for ancient items

sv_endmatch_item_drop_interval_legendary.title: sv_endmatch_item_drop_interval_legendary
sv_endmatch_item_drop_interval_legendary.description: The time between drops on the end match scoreboard for legendary items

sv_endmatch_item_drop_interval_mythical.title: sv_endmatch_item_drop_interval_mythical
sv_endmatch_item_drop_interval_mythical.description: The time between drops on the end match scoreboard for mythical items

sv_endmatch_item_drop_interval_rare.title: sv_endmatch_item_drop_interval_rare
sv_endmatch_item_drop_interval_rare.description: The time between drops on the end match scoreboard for rare items

sv_ents_write_alarm.title: sv_ents_write_alarm
sv_ents_write_alarm.description: Print callstack every time CNetworkGameServerBase::WriteEntityUpdate takes more than this amount of milliseconds

sv_extra_client_connect_time.title: sv_extra_client_connect_time
sv_extra_client_connect_time.description: Seconds after client connect during which extra frames are buffered to prevent non-delta'd update

sv_extreme_strafe_accuracy_fishtail.title: sv_extreme_strafe_accuracy_fishtail
sv_extreme_strafe_accuracy_fishtail.description: Number of degrees of aim 'fishtail' when making an extreme strafe direction change

sv_falldamage_to_below_player_multiplier.title: sv_falldamage_to_below_player_multiplier
sv_falldamage_to_below_player_multiplier.description: Scale damage when distributed across two players

sv_falldamage_to_below_player_ratio.title: sv_falldamage_to_below_player_ratio
sv_falldamage_to_below_player_ratio.description: Landing on a another player's head gives them this ratio of the damage.

sv_filterban.title: sv_filterban

sv_flashed_amount_for_blind_kill.description: Minimum flashed alpha value for a player to be awarded a blind kill on the kill feed.

sv_fps_max.title: sv_fps_max
sv_fps_max.description: Dedicated server frame rate limiter. 0=tick rate. Only applies to the dedicated server.

sv_full_alltalk.title: sv_full_alltalk
sv_full_alltalk.description: Any player (including Spectator team) can speak to any other player

sv_game_mode_flags.title: sv_game_mode_flags
sv_game_mode_flags.description: Dedicated server game mode flags to run

sv_gameinstructor_disable.title: sv_gameinstructor_disable
sv_gameinstructor_disable.description: Force all clients to disable their game instructors.

sv_gameinstructor_enable.title: sv_gameinstructor_enable
sv_gameinstructor_enable.description: Force all clients to enable their game instructors.

sv_grenade_trajectory_prac_pipreview.title: sv_grenade_trajectory_prac_pipreview

sv_grenade_trajectory_time_spectator.title: sv_grenade_trajectory_time_spectator

sv_guardian_extra_equipment_ct.description: Extra starting equipment for CT players in guardian modes

sv_guardian_extra_equipment_t.title: sv_guardian_extra_equipment_t
sv_guardian_extra_equipment_t.description: Extra starting equipment for Terrorist players in guardian modes

sv_guardian_health_refresh_per_wave.title: sv_guardian_health_refresh_per_wave
sv_guardian_health_refresh_per_wave.description: Health given to survivors per wave in guardian mode.

sv_guardian_refresh_ammo_for_items_on_wa.title: sv_guardian_refresh_ammo_for_items_on_waves
sv_guardian_refresh_ammo_for_items_on_wa.description: List of additional weapons to refill ammo on waves.

sv_guardian_respawn_health.title: sv_guardian_respawn_health
sv_guardian_respawn_health.description: Starting health of guardian players when respawned.

sv_jump_impulse.title: sv_jump_impulse
sv_jump_impulse.description: Initial upward velocity for player jumps; sqrt(2*gravity*height).

sv_jump_precision_enable.title: sv_jump_precision_enable
sv_jump_precision_enable.description: Enable jump precision. Some game modes benefit from being able to turn this off.

sv_jump_spam_penalty_time.title: sv_jump_spam_penalty_time
sv_jump_spam_penalty_time.description: For subtick jumps, if this much time has elapsed since the last time the user has pressed the jump key, pretend they hadn't. Lowering this makes bunnyhopping easier.

sv_kick_ban_duration.title: sv_kick_ban_duration
sv_kick_ban_duration.description: How long should a kick ban from the server should last (in minutes)

sv_kick_players_with_cooldown.title: sv_kick_players_with_cooldown
sv_kick_players_with_cooldown.description: (0: do not kick on insecure servers; 1: kick players with Untrusted status or convicted by Overwatch; 2: kick players with any cooldown)

sv_ladder_angle.title: sv_ladder_angle
sv_ladder_angle.description: Cos of angle of incidence to ladder perpendicular for applying ladder_dampen

sv_ladder_dampen.title: sv_ladder_dampen
sv_ladder_dampen.description: Amount to dampen perpendicular movement on a ladder

sv_ladder_slack_z_mult.title: sv_ladder_slack_z_mult
sv_ladder_slack_z_mult.description: Difference in Z increases toward the middle of the slack ladder.

sv_lagcompensationforcerestore.title: sv_lagcompensationforcerestore
sv_lagcompensationforcerestore.description: Don't test validity of a lag comp restore, just do it.

sv_lan.title: sv_lan
sv_lan.description: Server is a lan server ( no heartbeat, no authentication, no non-class C addresses )

sv_late_commands_allowed.title: sv_late_commands_allowed
sv_late_commands_allowed.description: Allow N late commands to run at 0 timescale prior to running an on-time command. Negative values for network round trip based calculation with a hard cap of the of absolute value

sv_limit_buyrandom_per_life.title: sv_limit_buyrandom_per_life
sv_limit_buyrandom_per_life.description: Enable to limit buyrandom command to only run once per player life

sv_log_change_offsets.title: sv_log_change_offsets
sv_log_change_offsets.description: Log change offsets to game/varchangeinfoN.log files.

sv_log_onefile.title: sv_log_onefile
sv_log_onefile.description: Log server information to only one file.

sv_logbans.title: sv_logbans
sv_logbans.description: Log server bans in the server logs.

sv_logblocks.title: sv_logblocks
sv_logblocks.description: If true when log when a query is blocked (can cause very large log files)

sv_logecho.title: sv_logecho
sv_logecho.description: Echo log information to the console.

sv_logfile.title: sv_logfile
sv_logfile.description: Log server information in the log file.

sv_logflush.title: sv_logflush
sv_logflush.description: Flush the log file to disk on each write (slow).

sv_logsdir.title: sv_logsdir
sv_logsdir.description: Folder in the game directory where server logs will be stored.

sv_long_frame_ms.title: sv_long_frame_ms
sv_long_frame_ms.description: If a server frame takes longer than N ms, complain about it.  (Dedicated server only.)  See also engine_frametime_warnings_enable.

sv_mapvetopickvote_maps.title: sv_mapvetopickvote_maps
sv_mapvetopickvote_maps.description: Which maps are used for map veto pick sequence

sv_mapvetopickvote_phase_duration.title: sv_mapvetopickvote_phase_duration
sv_mapvetopickvote_phase_duration.description: How many seconds each phase lasts

sv_mapvetopickvote_rnd.title: sv_mapvetopickvote_rnd
sv_mapvetopickvote_rnd.description: When enabled will shuffle veto pick maps list order every time

sv_matchend_drops_enabled.title: sv_matchend_drops_enabled
sv_matchend_drops_enabled.description: Rewards gameplay time is always accumulated for players, but drops at the end of the match can be prevented

sv_matchpause_auto_5v5.title: sv_matchpause_auto_5v5
sv_matchpause_auto_5v5.description: When enabled will automatically pause the match at next freeze time if less than 5 players are connected on each team.

sv_max_change_offsets.title: sv_max_change_offsets
sv_max_change_offsets.description: How many network changes to track before requiring full diff check.

sv_max_distance_transmit_footsteps.title: sv_max_distance_transmit_footsteps
sv_max_distance_transmit_footsteps.description: Maximum distance to transmit footstep sound effects.

sv_max_queries_sec.title: sv_max_queries_sec
sv_max_queries_sec.description: Maximum queries per second to respond to from a single IP address.

sv_max_queries_sec_global.title: sv_max_queries_sec_global
sv_max_queries_sec_global.description: Maximum queries per second to respond to from anywhere.

sv_max_queries_window.title: sv_max_queries_window
sv_max_queries_window.description: Window over which to average queries per second averages.

sv_max_unreliable_delta_size.title: sv_max_unreliable_delta_size
sv_max_unreliable_delta_size.description: Maximum allowable entity delta size over unreliable delivery.

sv_maxrate.title: sv_maxrate
sv_maxrate.description: Max bandwidth rate allowed on server, 0 == unlimited

sv_maxuptimelimit.title: sv_maxuptimelimit
sv_maxuptimelimit.description: Number of hours to operate before trying sv_shutdown.

sv_maxvelocity.title: sv_maxvelocity
sv_maxvelocity.description: Maximum speed any ballistically moving object is allowed to attain per axis.

sv_memlimit.title: sv_memlimit
sv_memlimit.description: If set, whenever a game ends, if the total memory used by the server is greater than this # of megabytes, the server will exit.

sv_merge_changes_after_tick_with_calcdel.title: sv_merge_changes_after_tick_with_calcdelta
sv_merge_changes_after_tick_with_calcdel.description: This fixes bugs where pure calcdelta is used due to recipient changing but it doesn't pick up a field change where the value was changed back to same value as the from snapshot even though the destination fields change list does note the change. Set to 2 to spew any changes merged in by this fix.

sv_minimum_desired_chicken_count.title: sv_minimum_desired_chicken_count
sv_minimum_desired_chicken_count.description: Minimum number of chickens to attempt to spawn in the map

sv_minrate.title: sv_minrate
sv_minrate.description: Min bandwidth rate allowed on server, 0 == unlimited

sv_mmqueue_reservation_extended_timeout.title: sv_mmqueue_reservation_extended_timeout
sv_mmqueue_reservation_extended_timeout.description: Extended time in seconds before mmqueue reservation expires.

sv_mmqueue_reservation_timeout.title: sv_mmqueue_reservation_timeout
sv_mmqueue_reservation_timeout.description: Time in seconds before mmqueue reservation expires.

sv_mover_maxslope.title: sv_mover_maxslope
sv_mover_maxslope.description: The maximum slope the player can overcome [-]

sv_mover_pogodampingratio.title: sv_mover_pogodampingratio
sv_mover_pogodampingratio.description: The capsule pogo stick damping ratio [-]

sv_networkvar_perfieldtracking.title: sv_networkvar_perfieldtracking
sv_networkvar_perfieldtracking.description: Track individual field offset changes, rather than a single dirty flag for the whole entity.

sv_networkvar_validate.title: sv_networkvar_validate
sv_networkvar_validate.description: Validate each StateChanged against known offsets.

sv_no_navmesh.title: sv_no_navmesh
sv_no_navmesh.description: Block loading of the navmesh. Unplayable, only used for memory sampling.

sv_noclipduringpause.title: sv_noclipduringpause
sv_noclipduringpause.description: If cheats are enabled, then you can noclip with the game paused (for doing screenshots, etc.).

sv_nowinpanel.title: sv_nowinpanel
sv_nowinpanel.description: Turn on/off win panel on server

sv_parallel_checktransmit.title: sv_parallel_checktransmit
sv_parallel_checktransmit.description: Set to 1 to use threaded checkentities for transmit/pvs on listen servers, 2 for dedicated servers.

sv_parallel_packentities.title: sv_parallel_packentities
sv_parallel_packentities.description: Set to 1 to use threaded snapshot sending on listen servers, 2 for dedicated servers.

sv_parallel_sendsnapshot.title: sv_parallel_sendsnapshot
sv_parallel_sendsnapshot.description: 0: run all send jobs on main thread; 1: send jobs run asynchronously (except on dedicated server); 2: send jobs asynchronously; 3: send jobs run in parallel but block to not overlap the next tick; 4: main server clients' send jobs run in parallel, then HLTV server jobs; this approximately matches pre-async profile for a single HLTV server configuration

sv_password.title: sv_password
sv_password.description: Server password for entry into multiplayer games

sv_pausable_dev.title: sv_pausable_dev
sv_pausable_dev.description: Whether listen server is pausable when running -dev and playing solo against bots

sv_pausable_dev_ds.title: sv_pausable_dev_ds
sv_pausable_dev_ds.description: Whether dedicated server is pausable when running -dev and playing solo against bots

sv_pause_on_console_open.title: sv_pause_on_console_open
sv_pause_on_console_open.description: 1 = Pause the game when pressing ~ to open the console. CTRL+~ opens the console without pause.

sv_phys_debug_callback_entities.title: sv_phys_debug_callback_entities
sv_phys_debug_callback_entities.description: Print all entities that get touch callbacks. Each entity is printed only once.

sv_phys_sleep_enable.title: sv_phys_sleep_enable
sv_phys_sleep_enable.description: Enable sleeping for dynamic physics bodies.

sv_playerradio_use_allowlist.title: sv_playerradio_use_allowlist
sv_playerradio_use_allowlist.description: playerradio commands may only use responses from an allow list of commands.

sv_predictable_damage_tag_ticks.title: sv_predictable_damage_tag_ticks
sv_predictable_damage_tag_ticks.description: Delay player slowdown when damaged by # ticks to reduce misprediction effects

sv_prime_accounts_only.title: sv_prime_accounts_only
sv_prime_accounts_only.description: When this setting is enabled only prime users can connect to this game server.

sv_pure_kick_clients.title: sv_pure_kick_clients
sv_pure_kick_clients.description: If set to 1, the server will kick clients with mismatching files. Otherwise, it will issue a warning to the client.

sv_pure_trace.title: sv_pure_trace
sv_pure_trace.description: If set to 1, the server will print a message whenever a client is verifying a CRC for a file.

sv_pushaway_clientside.title: sv_pushaway_clientside
sv_pushaway_clientside.description: Clientside physics push away (0=off, 1=only localplayer, 1=all players)

sv_pushaway_force.title: sv_pushaway_force
sv_pushaway_force.description: How hard physics objects are pushed away from the players on the server.

sv_pushaway_hostage_force.title: sv_pushaway_hostage_force
sv_pushaway_hostage_force.description: How hard the hostage is pushed away from physics objects (falls off with inverse square of distance).

sv_pushaway_max_force.title: sv_pushaway_max_force
sv_pushaway_max_force.description: Maximum amount of force applied to physics objects by players.

sv_pushaway_max_hostage_force.title: sv_pushaway_max_hostage_force
sv_pushaway_max_hostage_force.description: Maximum of how hard the hostage is pushed away from physics objects.

sv_pushaway_max_player_force.title: sv_pushaway_max_player_force
sv_pushaway_max_player_force.description: Maximum of how hard the player is pushed away from physics objects.

sv_pushaway_min_player_speed.title: sv_pushaway_min_player_speed
sv_pushaway_min_player_speed.description: If a player is moving slower than this, don't push away physics objects (enables ducking behind things).

sv_pushaway_player_force.title: sv_pushaway_player_force
sv_pushaway_player_force.description: How hard the player is pushed away from physics objects (falls off with inverse square of distance).

sv_pvs_entity.title: sv_pvs_entity
sv_pvs_entity.description: If set, only allows this ent index to network (other than players and things that force sending).

sv_pvs_max_distance.title: sv_pvs_max_distance
sv_pvs_max_distance.description: if set, adds a maximum range to PVS/PAS checks

sv_pvs_random.title: sv_pvs_random
sv_pvs_random.description: If set, objects blink in/out of pvs randomly.

sv_quantize_movement_input.title: sv_quantize_movement_input
sv_quantize_movement_input.description: Quantize movement input values. Enabling this restricts players from using analog input to move at fractional speeds normally impossible with digital button input.

sv_radio_throttle_window.title: sv_radio_throttle_window
sv_radio_throttle_window.description: The number of seconds before radio command tokens refresh.

sv_rcon_banpenalty.title: sv_rcon_banpenalty
sv_rcon_banpenalty.description: Number of minutes to ban users who fail rcon authentication

sv_rcon_maxfailures.title: sv_rcon_maxfailures
sv_rcon_maxfailures.description: Max number of times a user can fail rcon authentication before being banned

sv_rcon_minfailures.title: sv_rcon_minfailures
sv_rcon_minfailures.description: Number of times a user can fail rcon authentication in sv_rcon_minfailuretime before being banned

sv_rcon_minfailuretime.title: sv_rcon_minfailuretime
sv_rcon_minfailuretime.description: Number of seconds to track failed rcon authentications

sv_record_item_time_data.title: sv_record_item_time_data
sv_record_item_time_data.description: Turn on recording of per player item time data into the server log.

sv_recvbuf_messages.title: sv_recvbuf_messages
sv_recvbuf_messages.description: Max number of messages that can be queued in a netchan receive buffer for an ordinary connection from a client.

sv_regeneration_force_on.title: sv_regeneration_force_on
sv_regeneration_force_on.description: Cheat to test regenerative health systems

sv_region.title: sv_region
sv_region.description: The region of the world to report this server in.

sv_reliableavatardata.title: sv_reliableavatardata
sv_reliableavatardata.description: Use server overrides for steam avatars

sv_reserve_slots_for_reconnecting_player.title: sv_reserve_slots_for_reconnecting_players_kick_prior
sv_reserve_slots_for_reconnecting_player.description: Kick a previously connected player with the same steamID if a replacement comes along

sv_search_team_key.title: sv_search_team_key
sv_search_team_key.description: When initiating team search, set this key to match with known opponents team

sv_server_graphic1.title: sv_server_graphic1
sv_server_graphic1.description: A 360x60 (<16kb) image file in /csgo/ that will be displayed to spectators.

sv_server_graphic2.title: sv_server_graphic2
sv_server_graphic2.description: A 220x45 (<16kb) image file in /csgo/ that will be displayed to spectators.

sv_show_bot_difficulty_in_name.title: sv_show_bot_difficulty_in_name
sv_show_bot_difficulty_in_name.description: 0 = hide bot difficulty in bot name, 1 = show bot difficulty in bot name

sv_show_move_collisions.title: sv_show_move_collisions
sv_show_move_collisions.description: Enable this to visualize collisions between player and geometry.

sv_show_teammate_death_notification.title: sv_show_teammate_death_notification
sv_show_teammate_death_notification.description: Show chat notification upon teammate death

sv_show_voip_indicator_for_enemies.title: sv_show_voip_indicator_for_enemies
sv_show_voip_indicator_for_enemies.description: Makes it so the voip icon is shown over enemies as well as allies when they are talking

sv_showbullethits.title: sv_showbullethits
sv_showbullethits.description: 1=show hits and near misses, 2=show hits only

sv_showhitregistration.title: sv_showhitregistration
sv_showhitregistration.description: Display lag_compensated hitboxes. 0 = off, 1 = server only, 2 = client only, 3 = both server and client

sv_showimpacts.title: sv_showimpacts
sv_showimpacts.description: Shows client (red) and server (blue) bullet impact point (1=both, 2=client-only, 3=server-only)

sv_showimpacts_penetration.title: sv_showimpacts_penetration
sv_showimpacts_penetration.description: Shows extra data when bullets penetrate. (use sv_showimpacts_time to increase time shown)

sv_showimpacts_time.title: sv_showimpacts_time
sv_showimpacts_time.description: Duration bullet impact indicators remain before disappearing

sv_showladders.title: sv_showladders
sv_showladders.description: Show bbox and dismount points for all ladders (must be set before level load.)

sv_showlagcompensation_rec.title: sv_showlagcompensation_rec
sv_showlagcompensation_rec.description: If > 0, show lag compensation hitboxes as they're recorded. Value is for how long.

sv_showplayerhitboxes.title: sv_showplayerhitboxes
sv_showplayerhitboxes.description: Show lag compensated hitboxes for the specified player index whenever a player fires.

sv_shutdown_immediately_on_request.title: sv_shutdown_immediately_on_request
sv_shutdown_immediately_on_request.description: The server will always shutdown on receiving the shutdown request, even if not hibernating

sv_skirmish_id.title: sv_skirmish_id
sv_skirmish_id.description: Dedicated server skirmish id to run

sv_skyname.title: sv_skyname
sv_skyname.description: Current name of the skybox texture

sv_snapshot_unlimited.title: sv_snapshot_unlimited
sv_snapshot_unlimited.description: For debugging, don't throw away old snapshots so that if you break in debugger (on remote client or server) it won't require an uncompressed update to resume.  You may run out of memory of course...

sv_sniper_tracer_innacuracy.title: sv_sniper_tracer_innacuracy
sv_sniper_tracer_innacuracy.description: How inaccurate a sniper shot can be before we trip sv_sniper_tracer_mode behavior.

sv_sniper_tracer_innacuracy_length.title: sv_sniper_tracer_innacuracy_length
sv_sniper_tracer_innacuracy_length.description: How far should the tracer draw if we trip sv_sniper_tracer_mode behavior.

sv_sniper_tracer_mode.title: sv_sniper_tracer_mode
sv_sniper_tracer_mode.description: Mode for sniper tracers. 0: legacy, 1: hide when more than sv_sniper_tracer_innacuracy inaccurate.

sv_spawn_afk_bomb_drop_time.title: sv_spawn_afk_bomb_drop_time
sv_spawn_afk_bomb_drop_time.description: Players that have never moved since they spawned will drop the bomb after this amount of time.

sv_spec_hear.title: sv_spec_hear
sv_spec_hear.description: Determines who spectators can hear: 0: only spectators; 1: all players; 2: spectated team; 3: self only; 4: nobody

sv_steamauth_enforce.title: sv_steamauth_enforce
sv_steamauth_enforce.description: By default, player must maintain a reliable connection to Steam servers. When player Steam session drops, enforce it: 2 = instantly kick, 1 = kick at next spawn, 0 = do not kick.

sv_steamauth_ignore_localhost.title: sv_steamauth_ignore_localhost
sv_steamauth_ignore_localhost.description: Ignore VAC and auth errors for client connected via localhost address or in-engine loopback

sv_steamgroup.title: sv_steamgroup
sv_steamgroup.description: The ID of the steam group that this server belongs to. You can find your group's ID on the admin profile page in the steam community.

sv_steamgroup_exclusive.title: sv_steamgroup_exclusive
sv_steamgroup_exclusive.description: If set, only members of Steam group will be able to join the server when it's empty, public people will be able to join the server only if it has players.

sv_stopspeed.title: sv_stopspeed
sv_stopspeed.description: Minimum stopping speed when on ground.

sv_stressbots.title: sv_stressbots
sv_stressbots.description: If set to 1, the server calculates data and fills packets to bots. Used for perf testing.

sv_strict_notarget.title: sv_strict_notarget
sv_strict_notarget.description: If set, notarget will cause entities to never think they are in the pvs

sv_tags.title: sv_tags
sv_tags.description: Server tags. Used to provide extra information to clients when they're browsing for servers. Separate tags with a comma.

sv_talk_after_dying_time.title: sv_talk_after_dying_time
sv_talk_after_dying_time.description: The number of seconds a player can continue talking after dying as if they were still alive

sv_talk_enemy_dead.title: sv_talk_enemy_dead
sv_talk_enemy_dead.description: Dead players can hear all dead enemy communication (voice, chat)

sv_talk_enemy_living.title: sv_talk_enemy_living
sv_talk_enemy_living.description: Living players can hear all living enemy communication (voice, chat)

sv_teamid_overhead.title: sv_teamid_overhead
sv_teamid_overhead.description: Shows teamID over player's heads.  0 = off, 1 = on

sv_temp_baseline_string_table_buffer_siz.title: sv_temp_baseline_string_table_buffer_size
sv_temp_baseline_string_table_buffer_siz.description: Buffer size for writing string table baselines

sv_timebetweenducks.title: sv_timebetweenducks
sv_timebetweenducks.description: Minimum time before recognizing consecutive duck key

sv_timeout.title: sv_timeout
sv_timeout.description: After this many seconds without a message from fully connected client, the client is dropped

sv_unlag_fixstuck.title: sv_unlag_fixstuck
sv_unlag_fixstuck.description: Disallow backtracking a player for lag compensation if it will cause them to become stuck

sv_unpause_on_console_close.title: sv_unpause_on_console_close
sv_unpause_on_console_close.description: 1 = Unpause the game when pressing ~ to close the console. 0 = Leave the game paused.

sv_update_animgraph_movement_in_finish.title: sv_update_animgraph_movement_in_finish
sv_update_animgraph_movement_in_finish.description: Whether we should update animgraph movement in FinishMove.

sv_use_hi_pri_context_switch_time.title: sv_use_hi_pri_context_switch_time
sv_use_hi_pri_context_switch_time.description: +use search behaves as though high priority items are usable for this long after they become unusable to avoid players accidentally performing a different action.

sv_usercmd_custom_random_seed.title: sv_usercmd_custom_random_seed
sv_usercmd_custom_random_seed.description: When enabled server will populate an additional random seed independent of the client

sv_usercmd_execute_warning_ms.title: sv_usercmd_execute_warning_ms
sv_usercmd_execute_warning_ms.description: Emit a warning if we spend more than N ms executing user commands for a single player

sv_vac_webapi_auth_key.title: sv_vac_webapi_auth_key
sv_vac_webapi_auth_key.description: Key for when posting to vac related webapis.

sv_versus_screen_scene_id.title: sv_versus_screen_scene_id
sv_versus_screen_scene_id.description: Determines which scene is used for the versus screen.

sv_visiblemaxplayers.title: sv_visiblemaxplayers
sv_visiblemaxplayers.description: Overrides the max players reported to prospective clients

sv_voicecodec.title: sv_voicecodec
sv_voicecodec.description: Specifies which voice codec DLL to use in a game. Set to the name of the DLL without the extension.

sv_vote_command_delay.title: sv_vote_command_delay
sv_vote_command_delay.description: How long after a vote passes until the action happens

sv_vote_count_spectator_votes.title: sv_vote_count_spectator_votes
sv_vote_count_spectator_votes.description: Allow spectators to vote on issues?

sv_vote_creation_timer.title: sv_vote_creation_timer
sv_vote_creation_timer.description: How often someone can individually call a vote.

sv_vote_disallow_kick_on_match_point.title: sv_vote_disallow_kick_on_match_point
sv_vote_disallow_kick_on_match_point.description: Disallow vote kicking on the match point round.

sv_vote_failure_timer.title: sv_vote_failure_timer
sv_vote_failure_timer.description: A vote that fails cannot be re-submitted for this long

sv_vote_issue_changelevel_allowed.title: sv_vote_issue_changelevel_allowed
sv_vote_issue_changelevel_allowed.description: Can people hold votes to change levels?

sv_vote_issue_kick_allowed.title: sv_vote_issue_kick_allowed
sv_vote_issue_kick_allowed.description: Can people hold votes to kick players from the server?

sv_vote_issue_loadbackup_allowed.title: sv_vote_issue_loadbackup_allowed
sv_vote_issue_loadbackup_allowed.description: Can people hold votes to load match from backup?

sv_vote_issue_loadbackup_spec_authoritat.title: sv_vote_issue_loadbackup_spec_authoritative
sv_vote_issue_loadbackup_spec_authoritat.description: When enabled, admins load match from backup without players vote

sv_vote_issue_loadbackup_spec_only.title: sv_vote_issue_loadbackup_spec_only
sv_vote_issue_loadbackup_spec_only.description: When enabled, only admins load match from backup

sv_vote_issue_loadbackup_spec_safe.title: sv_vote_issue_loadbackup_spec_safe
sv_vote_issue_loadbackup_spec_safe.description: When enabled, admins load match from backup in safe time of the round only

sv_vote_issue_matchready_allowed.title: sv_vote_issue_matchready_allowed
sv_vote_issue_matchready_allowed.description: Can people hold votes to ready/unready the match?

sv_vote_issue_nextlevel_allowed.title: sv_vote_issue_nextlevel_allowed
sv_vote_issue_nextlevel_allowed.description: Can people hold votes to set the next level?

sv_vote_issue_nextlevel_allowextend.title: sv_vote_issue_nextlevel_allowextend
sv_vote_issue_nextlevel_allowextend.description: Allow players to extend the current map?

sv_vote_issue_nextlevel_choicesmode.title: sv_vote_issue_nextlevel_choicesmode
sv_vote_issue_nextlevel_choicesmode.description: Present players with a list of lowest playtime maps to choose from?

sv_vote_issue_nextlevel_prevent_change.title: sv_vote_issue_nextlevel_prevent_change
sv_vote_issue_nextlevel_prevent_change.description: Not allowed to vote for a nextlevel if one has already been set.

sv_vote_issue_pause_match_allowed.title: sv_vote_issue_pause_match_allowed
sv_vote_issue_pause_match_allowed.description: Can people hold votes to pause/unpause the match?

sv_vote_issue_pause_match_spec_only.title: sv_vote_issue_pause_match_spec_only
sv_vote_issue_pause_match_spec_only.description: When enabled, only admins start technical pause

sv_vote_issue_restart_game_allowed.title: sv_vote_issue_restart_game_allowed
sv_vote_issue_restart_game_allowed.description: Can people hold votes to restart the game?

sv_vote_issue_scramble_teams_allowed.title: sv_vote_issue_scramble_teams_allowed
sv_vote_issue_scramble_teams_allowed.description: Can people hold votes to scramble the teams?

sv_vote_issue_surrrender_allowed.title: sv_vote_issue_surrrender_allowed
sv_vote_issue_surrrender_allowed.description: Can people hold votes to surrender?

sv_vote_issue_swap_teams_allowed.title: sv_vote_issue_swap_teams_allowed
sv_vote_issue_swap_teams_allowed.description: Can people hold votes to swap the teams?

sv_vote_issue_timeout_allowed.title: sv_vote_issue_timeout_allowed
sv_vote_issue_timeout_allowed.description: Can people hold votes to time out?

sv_vote_kick_ban_duration.title: sv_vote_kick_ban_duration
sv_vote_kick_ban_duration.description: How long should a kick vote ban someone from the server? (in minutes)

sv_vote_quorum_ratio.title: sv_vote_quorum_ratio

sv_vote_to_changelevel_rndmin.description: When non-zero, restricts vote to change level to this many first rounds or minutes of the match (default 0, vote is not disallowed)

tv_allow_camera_man_steamid2.description: Allows tournament production tv cameraman to run csgo.exe -interactivecaster on SteamID 7650123456XXX and be the tv camera man.

tv_allow_static_shots.title: tv_allow_static_shots
